title: Quantitative Research Internship (Summer 2026)
description:
Internship period: 11 May ‚Äì 31 July 2026
Location: Singapore (CBD)
Who are we?
BlockTech is a fast-paced algorithmic trading firm facilitating global cryptocurrency trading while expanding into regulated markets. As we continue to grow rapidly, we are looking for a Quantitative Research intern to join us amid our exciting scale-up phase!
This is the ideal internship for highly motivated quantitative students who want hands-on exposure to real-world high-frequency trading research.¬†
What will you do?
During this internship, you will work on a quantitative research project at the intersection of pricing and machine learning, closely guided by our experienced quantitative researchers.
Your project will focus on:
Researching and analyzing pricing components used in HFT models.
Investigating the value, calibration, and behavior of model parameters and features.
Applying machine learning and statistical techniques to market data.
Evaluating parameter stability, predictive power, and sensitivity.
Presenting results and insights to the quantitative research team.
You will work with production-level data and models, gaining exposure to how quantitative research translates into live trading systems.
What do we require from you?
Currently enrolled in, or recently graduated from, a Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs program in:
Mathematics
Physics
Computer Science
or another quantitative discipline
Strong academic performance
Solid Python programming skills
Familiarity with statistics, optimization, and machine learning techniques
Ability to work partially independently on projects while collaborating closely and communicating effectively with quantitative researchers and traders.
Curiosity, analytical thinking, and a hands-on mindset
A genuine interest in financial markets and algorithmic trading
Fluency in English (written and verbal)
What is in it for you?
A hands-on quantitative research internship at a leading algorithmic trading firm
Direct mentorship from experienced quantitative researchers and traders
Exposure to real HFT pricing models and market data
A challenging research project with tangible impact
A modern, relaxed office in the heart of Singapore‚Äôs financial district
Daily breakfast, warm lunch, snacks, and drinks
Social activities with the team
A strong stepping stone towards a full-time Quantitative Researcher or Trader role at BlockTech
Competitive compensation
Our culture
At BlockTech, we are a team of passionate trading and tech enthusiasts driven by curiosity, ownership, and continuous improvement. Interns are treated as permanent contributors: your ideas matter, your work has impact, and your learning is taken seriously.
You will be challenged, supported, and encouraged to push beyond theory into practical, high-performance quantitative research.
Are you looking to gain practical experience in a fast-paced HFT environment and build a strong foundation for your future career?
Join BlockTech and experience quantitative research where theory meets production.

title: Graduate Quantitative Analyst
description:
Who are we looking for?
BlockTech is a fast-paced algorithmic trading firm facilitating global cryptocurrency trading while expanding into regulated markets
Our state-of-the-art pricing models are controlled through intuitive and highly performant interfaces. These operations generate a lot of data, which we use to gain insight into our trading strategies and market positions. Currently, we are building out our analytics capabilities to further automate and streamline our data processing needs. As such, we are looking for a Quantitative Analyst to strengthen the team and help in this development.
What will you do?
Collaborate directly with the other quants and traders on the trading floor and bring insight into our mathematical models
High-volume trade analysis to enhance our trading strategies and develop the systems and metrics that make this possible
Initiate and manage automation projects together with our pricing, execution and risk teams
Develop visualizations to gain more insights into our trading strategies and performance
What is in it for you?
A full-time position in a relaxed and modern office in Amsterdam
Competitive compensation consisting of a base salary combined with a very attractive bonus plan based on individual and company performance
Outstanding performance is rewarded with the opportunity to buy into the trading fund
Annual Learning & Development budget of EUR 2,500
Pension plan, company laptop, and reimbursement of your internet costs at home
Extensive in-house training program
A highly collaborative and experienced Scrum/Agile team
The opportunity to work at the forefront of automated trading, using state-of-the-art technology
Daily breakfast and warm lunch. Additionally, snacks and drinks are provided throughout the day.
Gym membership reimbursement and the opportunity to engage in various sports during working hours, including kickboxing, CrossFit, fitness, and soccer
Regular social events, including weekly Friday drinks, monthly game nights, monthly company outings, quarterly sports competitions and bi-annual trips abroad!
For internationals: All-in relocation package and Dutch classes
Our culture
At our core, we are a team of passionate trading and tech enthusiasts committed to revolutionizing trading through automation. Our collaborative approach ensures that everyone contributes to achieving our ambitious goals.
In this role, you will be both challenged and stretched, with ample opportunities for growth and development, both within and beyond your main responsibilities.
We invest in our people by offering competitive compensation and benefits, fostering innovation, and celebrating success. Our commitment to personal development transcends traditional norms; we provide an equal playing field, promote reverse leadership, and offer boundless growth opportunities for all our employees.
Join us to unlock your potential and drive innovation in the exciting world of algorithmic trading.

title: Graduate Quantitative Trader
description:
Who are we looking for?
BlockTech is a fast-paced algorithmic trading firm facilitating global cryptocurrency trading while expanding into regulated markets. As we continue to grow rapidly, we are looking for a Quantitative Trader to join us amid our exciting scale-up phase!
What will you do?
After completing our extensive in-house training program, you will join one of our trading teams.
As a Quantitative Trader, you will ensure the smooth operation of our automated trading systems. Your responsibilities will include, but are not limited to:
Managing trading positions
Develop and test new strategies
Interpreting market flow and events
Evaluating trading performance
Fine-tuning automated trading algorithms
Design trading tools
You will become an expert in trading and know when and how to assist the trading system in capturing opportunities when necessary. Beyond the responsibilities listed above, you will actively collaborate with quantitative developers, software engineers, and data scientists to enhance our current trading setup and weigh in on the priorities of new projects.
At BlockTech, you will take on a lot of responsibility, with the freedom to chart your course to innovative solutions!
What is in it for you?
A permanent full-time position in a relaxed and trendy office located in the heart of Singapore's financial district (CBD)
Competitive compensation consisting of a base salary combined with a very attractive bonus plan based on individual and company performance
Outstanding performance is rewarded with the opportunity to buy into the trading fund
Laptop, home office budget and transportation allowance
Breakfast and warm lunch. Additionally, snacks and drinks are provided throughout the day.
The opportunity to work at the forefront of automated trading, using state-of-the-art technology
Extensive in-house training program in combination with an annual learning & development budget.
Reimbursement of gym membership, sports events, the opportunity to do sports during working hours, and unlimited access to a psychologist.
Regular social events, including bi-annual trips abroad, frequent outings, and weekly Friday drinks
For internationals: All-in relocation package
Our culture
At our core, we are a team of passionate trading and tech enthusiasts committed to revolutionizing trading through automation. Our collaborative approach ensures that everyone contributes to achieving our ambitious goals.
In this role, you will be both challenged and stretched, with ample opportunities for growth and development, both within and beyond your main responsibilities.
We invest in our people by offering competitive compensation and benefits, fostering innovation, and celebrating success. Our commitment to personal development transcends traditional norms; we provide an equal playing field, promote reverse leadership, and offer boundless growth opportunities for all our employees.
Join us to unlock your potential and drive innovation in the exciting world of algorithmic trading.

title: Junior Supply Chain Consultant
description:
About the role
Kickstart your consulting career!
Get ready to launch your career in consulting, and join us! You‚Äôll have a spot in our supply chain training boot camp in September. You‚Äôll sharpen your consulting expertise alongside fellow new starters from around the globe. In just three exciting weeks, our immersive training program covers everything from essential soft skills to advanced supply chain management to becoming a kick-ass Supply Chain Consultant. Afterwards, you're ready to start on one of our running projects.¬†
What can you do at Bluecrux?
You'll start immediately in a visible, autonomous role as a project member in one of our running value chain projects in industries such as life sciences, chemicals, food and beverages, and manufacturing.
You'll see yourself working on and contributing to the main project phases. Here's an idea of what to expect:
Analyze and Optimize: You will always analyze, map, and conduct existing Supply Chain and Operations business processes.
Collaborate: Work closely with clients to understand their needs and make a real impact. Think about preparing and conducting project interviews to understand the client's needs better. You will become aware of the customer organization and be part of the change in their organization and ways of working.
Track and report: You'll track KPIs and report them accurately to the customer project team, ensuring clear, actionable insights.
Document and deliver: You create the most important customer and project deliverables, such as top-notch project notes, guides and training material.
Here‚Äôs how you‚Äôll continuously be making an impact:
Tell us, what‚Äôs your flavour? All of our projects share a common transformation mission, and once you join a project, you‚Äôll be introduced to different extra layers of specialisation to add value. We will encourage you to explore and accelerate in Technology, Process knowledge, Data or Change Management.
#LI-KC1

title: Junior Supply Chain Data analyst
description:
About the role
In your role as a Junior Supply Chain Data Analyst, you work on global transformation and optimizing projects in Supply Chain. You contribute to successful project outcomes by focusing on the end-to-end data analyst roadmap, including data querying, data quality review, data analysis, dashboarding, and communication with client business and IT teams.
You'll start immediately in a visible, autonomous role as a project member in one of our running planning transformation projects in industries such as life sciences, chemicals, food and beverages, and manufacturing.
You will be part of a project team that is a mix of internal colleagues, supply chain planners, IT teams and managers from the client side, and you'll be doing stuff like this:
Work with data: Collect, clean and analyze data to support better decisions. You help build dashboards and transform raw data into insights.
Support master data processes: Help structure and maintain key supply chain data with the team.
Connect systems: Learn how systems like ERP, APS and WMS interact, and help streamline data flows between them.
Document & align: Assist in documenting processes, drafting data policies, and keeping stakeholders aligned.
Contribute to projects: Be involved in data migrations, process improvements and supporting workshops.
Grow your skills: Get hands-on experience with data warehousing, modelling, and integration tools.
#LI-RJ1

title: Junior Accountant
description:
Your Role
As a 
Junior Accountant
, you will take ownership of the day‚Äëto‚Äëday accounting for a portfolio of international client companies. You‚Äôll be a trusted finance contact for clients, balancing structured accounting work with ad‚Äëhoc requests in a dynamic, global environment. This role is ideal for someone who enjoys responsibility, client interaction, and learning by doing.
What You‚Äôll Be Doing
Managing end‚Äëto‚Äëend accounting for private and corporate clients
Preparing monthly and quarterly reports (VAT/ICT) and annual accounts
Handling tax filings and supporting tax‚Äërelated processes

title: Junior Onboarding Officer (Investor Services)
description:
Onboarding Officers 
are responsible for servicing the investors in a fund: collective of investors that pool money to make specific investments and benefit from the inherent advantages of working as a group. As Onboarding Officer you will have a challenging but diversified role within a team of Investor Services specialists. You will be supporting the Investor Services team with the onboarding of new investors, ensuring that all Customer Due Diligence (CDD) requirements are met before an investor can participate in a fund. Due to the diversified type of fund clients (hedge funds, real estate, fund of funds, private equity, managed accounts and cryptocurrency) and investor profiles, we are looking for someone who is hands-on and has a can-do mentality.
¬†
You will work closely with the Onboarding Team Lead and the different teams to ensure that our growing client base maintains compliance with applicable laws, regulations, supervisory requirements and AML policies and procedures. You will support identifying and assessing the compliance risks faced, as well as assisting in the management and monitoring of these risks. As Onboarding Officer you will operate in the first line of defence.
¬†
Duties & Responsibilities:
Serve as point of contact for clients during the investor onboarding process and periodical reviews.
Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, understanding their unique needs and preferences.
Communicate effectively to manage client expectations and address concerns or inquiries.
Support with the investor onboarding plan for each client, tailored to their specific policies.
Collaborate with internal teams to ensure the timely and accurate setup of new investors.
Appropriately support investors with all necessary CDD-requirements for a smooth onboarding.
Address any questions or issues that clients may have during the onboarding process.
Ensure that all necessary compliance documents are completed and signed by investors and saved in Bolder‚Äôs DMS.
Maintain accurate records of client interactions and documentation, keeping client profiles up to date.

title: Junior Corporate Administrator
description:

Provide assistance to the Corporate Administration team in ensuring all transactions pertaining to the management of the clients‚Äô affairs are executed.

Liaison with external parties such as Bankers, Auditors, Lawyers and Regulatory bodies.
Develop and maintain relationships with internal departments of the Company.
Communicate effectively with all levels of management, other departments, business areas and clients.
Maintain comprehensive and up to date client, business and transaction records on interaction with clients at all times.
Timely filing and updating of company and client information on relevant internal systems.
Daily and effective input on time-sheet or any time management system, if applicable.
Ensure compliance of portfolio with applicable legal framework and prescribed deadlines.
Familiarize and adhere to internal policies and procedures.

description:
About the role
Are you a final-year student pursuing a graduate, bachelor's, or master's degree in IT or Computer Science, looking for an internship?At Brainsquare, we offer hands-on internship opportunities where you become part of an enterprise software engineering team working on real-world challenges.

title: Graduate Program - Financial Services
description:
Analyst ‚Äì Financial Services
Singapore
Permanent
Role Summary
This is a great opportunity to join our fast-growing APAC team working with some of the world‚Äôs leading financial institutions.
As an 
Analyst
, you will be learning whilst working for Delta Capita‚Äôs clients, in a fast-paced environment with support and training provided. You will be placed on project with one of Delta Capita‚Äôs clients, the project will be within Delta Capita‚Äôs Post Trade Services team or Client Lifecycle Management team, further information on each of these is below. Over time, the Analyst role gives you the opportunity to rotate across different areas of financial institutions, as well as across multiple clients, therefore enabling you to gain exposure to various areas of the Financial Services Industry. This is an exciting and varied opportunity for anyone looking to kick start their career in financial services.
To know more about our Services offering click here 
Services - Delta Capita
The Role and Responsibilities
Your day to day may vary depending on which projects you are assigned to. Below provides examples of the types of day to day activities you may engage in on a project:
Operations - Post Trade Services
Ensure the client is set up to trade with relevant and accurate data matched with signed agreements. (Defaults/pricing/commissions etc.)
Transactional reporting - Investigation of breaks/ resolution of breaks impacting regulatory reporting
Monitoring trades / work with desk to ensure trade flows downstream.
UAT Tests - engaging with product development and IT team to assist in streamlining BAU activities. (BOTs, etc.)
Answering queries from the clients
BAU usually consist of trades related queries from clients, Trade settlements, booking of conversion trades/ transfers
Liaising with external and internal stakeholder (i.e: settlement team, asset servicing team, conversion team
Client Lifecycle Management
End to end KYC/AML and client due diligence (CDD)
Gathering and analysing KYC documentation in accordance with the clients AML policy requirements to identify and close any gaps
Ensuring that key stakeholders are kept informed on progress or bottlenecks within the end-to-end KYC review process
Escalation to the appropriate teams where information cannot be sourced or provided / where prior exceptions have been granted on existing files and / or where additional sign off required to proceed
Sourcing of data from approved public sources using the methods outlined in policies and procedures.

title: Junior PPA Originator
description:
About Us
At Brook Green Supply, we are an independent B2B energy supplier committed to driving the transition to a sustainable energy future. We provide expert supply contracts, risk management solutions, and data-led insights to some of the UK‚Äôs most complex industrial and commercial energy consumers.
Our experienced team is expanding, and we are offering an exciting opportunity for an ambitious and proactive individual to join us. Your personal development and progression will align with the continued growth and success of the business.
Why this role matters
We are looking for a motivated and commercially curious Junior PPA Originator to join our team and support the growth of our PPA activities in the renewable energy markets. This role is a great opportunity for someone who has some experience or interest in energy markets, commercial negotiation, and client relationship work, and wants to grow into a more senior origination role over time.
What you‚Äôll do
‚Ä¢ Support the development of our PPA activity by helping to originate and progress power purchase agreement opportunities in the UK and broader renewable energy markets
‚Ä¢ Help build and maintain positive relationships with clients and counterparties, including corporate buyers, utilities and other energy market participants.
‚Ä¢ Assist in the negotiation and structuring of PPA contracts, working closely with senior team members to ensure commercial and contractual terms meet business requirements
‚Ä¢ Monitor market trends, pricing dynamics and policy developments in the power and renewable energy space to inform deal strategy ‚Ä¢ Reporting and analysis responsibilities (if applicable)
‚Ä¢ Work collaboratively with internal teams such as trading, commercial, and legal to support smooth transaction execution

title: Software Development Internship (Foundational Training)
description:
Chaos is a leading global software company that provides world-class visualization and design solutions, empowering creative minds to bring ideas to life.¬†
For over twenty years, Chaos has developed innovative technologies serving multiple industries, including architecture and design, media and entertainment, and product e-commerce. Chaos‚Äô solutions help architects, designers, VFX artists/animators, and other creative professionals share ideas, optimize workflows, and create immersive experiences.
Headquartered in Karlsruhe, Germany, Chaos is a global company with offices in 11 cities worldwide. In 2022, Chaos and Enscape merged, bringing together two industry-leading companies into one. Since then, Chaos has continued to grow with the additions of Cylindo, AXYZ Design, and Evolve Lab, further expanding our expertise and solutions across architecture, design, e-commerce, and AI. For more information, please visit
 
chaos.com
.
Chaos Camp is the preparatory course for the Chaos Internship Program. It is an online programming training for junior developers or students close to graduation interested in gaining the coding knowledge and skills essential for a career in software development for computer graphics. The top-performing participants in Chaos Camp will be invited for an interview to join the Chaos Internship Program in August 2026.
Are you ready to deepen your expertise in C++ algorithms and data structures? Ever wondered what powers modern computer graphics? Want to move beyond theory and jump-start a career in computer graphics development?
Chaos Camp is your opportunity to learn from top experts, find out what‚Äôs behind-the-scenes of visualization technologies, and be invited for an internship at Chaos.¬†
***The program is open for applicants based in Bulgaria, Czechia and Germany. Although the training will be conducted online, the best-performing participants will have the opportunity to join the Chaos team, which will require on-site presence in our offices in these locations: Sofia, Bulgaria; Prague, Czechia; Karlsruhe, Germany.***
What we offer:
Free intensive 24 week online training focused on algorithms and data structures for C++, computer graphics programming and ray tracing.
The training sessions will be conducted in English on the week evenings and are divided into two parts - Part I starting on April 16th, 2026 until August, and Part II starting September to end of November.
Training and mentorship by lecturers from our partner MNKnowledge and senior professionals from the Chaos team.
Chance to learn more about the software development world and 3D visualization by collaborating with members of the Chaos team.
Certificate of Completion issued by Chaos, awarded upon the successful completion of the course (80%+ lectures attended, 80%+ homework assignments completed).
Opportunity to join the Chaos team as an Intern after completing Part I of the training and further develop your skills by receiving additional lectures in C++ algorithms and machine learning, as well as on-the-job training.

title: Intern in Emerging Technologies (100%)
description:
Technology Development: 
You support the development of new technologies for Direct Air Capture (DAC) by analyzing various DAC approaches and contributing to early‚Äëstage, in‚Äëhouse technology innovation.¬†
Testing¬†Methods Development:
 You contribute to the development of methods and set-ups for technology testing and evaluation.¬†
Data Analysis:
 You combine your fundamental understanding of technology with advanced data analytics.¬†
System Impact Understanding:
 You understand the impact of individual technology components on the overall direct air capture process.¬†
Safety and Compliance: 
You follow Climeworks‚Äô safety rules, proactively communicate any identified risks to the department head, and take part in required safety training and exercises.

title: Intern in Testing Engineering (100%)
description:
Technology Development:
 You contribute to the rapid testing, engineering, and validation of innovative technology ideas and concepts to ensure reliable results for Direct Air Capture (DAC).¬†
System Design and Engineering:
 You support the design, development, and engineering of upgrades across Climeworks' testing portfolio, focusing on small to medium-scale systems.¬†
Test Facility Advancement:
 You play a key role in improving small to medium-scale test facilities by contributing to their ongoing technological development and refinement.¬†
Measurement Evaluation:
 You assess the feasibility of different measurement methods based on test results and practical implementation, providing recommendations for improvements or alternatives.¬†
Validation and Reporting:
 You validate engineered upgrades through careful planning, execution, data analysis, and communicate your findings effectively to relevant stakeholders.

title: Intern in Testing (100%)
description:
Testing & Validation:
¬†You actively support the rapid testing and validation of innovative technology ideas and concepts, ensuring reliable and meaningful results.¬†
Facility Development:
¬†You contribute to the further development of our small to midscale test facilities and help advance their technological capabilities.¬†
Adsorption/Desorption Investigations:
¬†You assist in exploring and analyzing the adsorption/desorption process to enhance understanding and optimize efficiency.¬†
Research & Method Exploration:
¬†You conduct literature reviews and market research to identify and evaluate measurement methods that deepen insights into our processes.¬†
Test Execution & Data Evaluation:
¬†You carry out various testing methods, critically assess the resulting data and ensure accuracy, reliability and consistency.¬†
Measurement Method Assessment: 
You evaluate the feasibility and practicality of different measurement approaches and provide recommendations for improvements or alternatives.

title: Intern in Data Analytics (100%)
description:
Operations Development:
¬†You will play an important role in defining how to operate the largest Direct Air Capture plants in the world in the most efficient way. You will build data products that derive insights from real time plant and business operations ‚Äì all part of making Climeworks technology more scalable.
Data Analytics:
¬†You will develop and maintain Python scripts for processing sensor data from our production plants and business process data from our ERP system. You will also write SQL queries to support database management and transform data for reporting. Your role will be responsible for building user-facing dashboards that enable Climeworks to maximize our carbon removal.
Collaboration with Business Partners:¬†
You will work closely with colleagues in Production Engineering or Business Finance (depending on background). Your role will be to understand their engineering requirements for plant operation (or financial excellence) and translate them into data analytics that deliver insights and drive actions.
Collaboration with Data Engineering:
¬†You will collaborate with the data engineering team (seeking advise and code reviews) to deploy your data pipelines to our data platform. You will learn how to write code in a production environment and how to build scalable solutions.
Communication & Presentation:¬†
You will communicate results, findings, and observations clearly and concisely to peers, and present them in technical reviews. You will serve as a collaborator and advisor on data projects aimed at process optimization and operational development, and contribute to strategic initiatives to scale DAC technology.

title: Internship - Energy Transition and offshore projects
description:

As a Regional Coordination Center (RCC), Coreso plays a crucial role in coordinating high-voltage electricity flows for European Transmission System Operators (TSOs), ensuring the security of electricity supply on a regional basis.

title: Junior Backend Engineer - Typescript
description:
Cozycozy is the only platform that gives you real-time access to all available holiday accommodations. Whether you're searching for a hotel, apartment, hostel, villa, or even a treehouse, our service features over 20 million listings from over 100 booking sites. You will find popular options like Airbnb, 
Booking.com
, Abritel/VRBO and 
hotels.com
, as well as plenty of specialised marketplaces to explore, such as Agriturismo, G√Ætes de France, Onefinestay, Belvilla,, Travelski, and many others. Experiencing rapid growth, we are now present in over 50 countries in 20 languages, with offices in Paris and Budapest.¬†
About the role
As a 
Junior Backend Engineer
 at Cozycozy, you will be a vital member of the team responsible for connecting and expanding our global inventory of over 20 million accommodations. Working closely with Senior Engineers, you will contribute directly to the development of new integrations and the maintenance of our high-volume back-end data pipelines.
This role is ideal for an ambitious engineer 
looking to build a foundational career in high-scale back-end systems
 using modern technologies like 
Node.js/TypeScript
 and gain hands-on experience with complex integration challenges (APIs and web scraping). You will receive mentorship and support while making a direct, measurable impact on our product‚Äôs core offering.
üëâ The position is an onsite role based in our office in 
Budapest.
Your mission
Integration Development & Support
New Integrations:
 Assist Senior Engineers in developing, testing, and deploying integrations with new accommodation partners using
Node.js/TypeScript.
Data Collection:
 Write and maintain reliable code to fetch both static partner information and real-time price and availability data, utilizing partner APIs or web scraping tools.
Troubleshooting:
 Actively participate in debugging and resolving issues related to existing integrations to ensure data accuracy and reliability.
Back-end System Contribution
Data Processing:
 Contribute to the maintenance and enhancement of back-end services responsible for data ingestion and processing, learning about performance optimization and scalability.
Database Operations:
 Perform basic operations and assist in optimizing queries across our 
MongoDB
 and 
PostgreSQL
 databases, under senior guidance.
Asynchronous Logic:
 Learn and apply concepts of 
RxJS
 and reactive programming within the 
Node.js
 environment to manage data streams efficiently.
Learning & Collaboration
Code Quality:
 Participate in regular code reviews, offering constructive feedback and learning best practices for writing clean, well-tested, and maintainable code.
Documentation:
 Create and update technical documentation for new and existing partner integrations.
Teamwork:
 Collaborate effectively with the engineering team, product managers, and business stakeholders to understand integration requirements.
This role may be for you if you have :
1-2 years of professional experience in software engineering, preferably in a back-end focused role, or equivalent project experience.
Core stack knowledge and experience in Node.js, JavaScript & TypeScript.
Familiarity with either NoSQL (MongoDB) or relational (PostgreSQL) databases.
A basic understanding of web concepts is a plus (cookies, sessions handling etc).
High curiosity and a strong desire to learn complex system architecture, data integration techniques, and reactive programming principles (RxJS).
A meticulous approach to writing code and debugging data synchronization issues.
Good written and verbal communication skills in English, suitable for a collaborative international environment.
An ability to take ownership of assigned tasks and seek help proactively when blocked.
Genuine enthusiasm for technology, travel, and joining a high-growth company.
What we offer
Jumpstart your career by joining our unique, international team where your contributions directly support our hyper-growth expansion across more than 50 countries, positioning Cozycozy at the forefront of global travel innovation!
Why join Cozycozy?
üöÄ Opportunity to learn from and be mentored by Senior engineers, accelerating your professional and technical growth.
üåç A stimulating and supportive work environment with an international team (12 nationalities represented) that is passionate about travel and innovation.
üí° Strong entrepreneurial and open-minded culture with numerous projects to imagine and lead.
‚òï Enjoy our office in the center of Budapest with unlimited coffee, tea, drinks, and snacks.
Our hiring process
A first 1:1 interview with the Hiring Manager
A Technical Test to present to the stakeholders
Meet the team onsite !
What‚Äôs Next?
Once we receive your application, we will thoroughly review your CV and cover letter and will return back to you with an update as soon as possible. We invite you to get to know more about us by visiting
 
www.cozycozy.com
 and follow us on
 
LinkedIn
 ,
 
Instagram
,
 
Tiktok
 and
 
Facebook
 !

title: Stagiair / Internship
description:
Over Dataline
Dataline is d√© onbetwiste marktleider in de ontwikkeling van MIS/ERP-software specifiek voor de grafische industrie. Met onze revolutionaire software MultiPress helpen we meer dan 14.000 gebruikers in 26 landen hun administratieve bedrijfsprocessen te optimaliseren.
Klaar om te PRESS-teren? Laat van je horen en¬†geeft ons aan wat je studeert, wat je interesses zijn en waarom je graag bij Dataline stage zou willen lopen. Vermeld ook je beschikbare periode en het aantal dagen per week dat je beschikbaar bent.
Stageomschrijving
Ben jij op zoek naar een uitdagende en leerzame stage in een internationale context waarbij je jouw theoretische kennis in de praktijk kunt brengen? Bij Dataline bieden we je die kans! We hebben meer dan 10 jaar ervaring met stagebegeleiding en zijn op zoek naar gemotiveerde stagiairs uit diverse opleidingsachtergronden. De stage, met ondersteuning van een ervaren interne stagebegeleider die oog heeft voor wat je graag doet, biedt een unieke kans om waardevolle werkervaring op te doen binnen een dynamische en professionele omgeving.¬†
Tijdens je stage bij Dataline krijg je de kans om te werken aan echte projecten die aansluiten bij je opleiding en interesses. Of je nu ge√Ønteresseerd bent in softwareontwikkeling, finance, HR, administratie, office management, marketing, of een andere discipline, wij zorgen ervoor dat je stage interessant en relevant is voor zowel jou als voor ons. Welke opleiding je ook volgt, wij hebben vast en zeker plaats voor jou. Je werkt samen met een team van ervaren professionals en krijgt de ruimte om je vaardigheden verder te ontwikkelen. Bovendien krijgen heel wat stagiairs de kans op een vaste job na hun stage.

title: Junior Front End Software Engineer
description:
About Us
DeepSea is a maritime technology leader, providing a unified optimisation platform that helps shipping companies cut fuel consumption, reduce emissions, and transform vessel performance across entire fleets.
Built on the most advanced maritime AI data pool in the world, DeepSea‚Äôs platform powers everything from vessel monitoring to advanced automation - helping clients achieve measurable results with clarity, speed and scale.
We are trusted by some of the world‚Äôs most forward-thinking ship owners and operators, and our team spans Greece, the UK, Armenia, Romania, Singapore and Japan. As the shipping industry undergoes enormous change, we are at the centre of that transition - helping our customers take control, reduce risk, and build competitive advantage.
About the position
We are looking for an experienced Front End Developer to join our team. You will develop intuitive products and internal tools based on user, product and business requirements, in collaboration with your Team Leader, Back End Software team, Architect and Product Department.
Our products are used by shipping company engineers and captains to optimise the technical operations and navigation of their vessels based on our in-house developed AI and optimisation algorithms. You will need to gain a good understanding of the domain and our research output to design improvements that make our backend infrastructure scalable and cover our customers‚Äô needs.
Main responsibilities:
Deliver intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces that enhance usability and overall user experience.
Develop and maintain React-based frontend applications with clean, scalable, and maintainable code.
Integrate frontend components with backend services, including in-house AI and optimization algorithms for vessel technical operations and navigation.
Optimize application performance to ensure fast load times, responsiveness, and smooth interactions.
Collaborate closely with backend engineers, architects, and DevOps teams to deliver end‚Äëto‚Äëend product features.
Leverage modern development tools and AI‚Äëassisted coding workflows to improve productivity and code quality.
Work with modern build tools and development workflows to ensure efficient delivery and high-quality releases.

title: Junior Flight Control System Engineer
description:
Our Company
Our mission at Dronamics is to 
improve economic opportunities and protect¬†society through drone technology. 
To achieve this, we are developing a new type of aircraft, one that is remotely-piloted, extremely fuel efficient and can land nearly anywhere. It can transport up to 350 kg¬† over 2,500 km, saving time, cost and co2 emissions. Apart from moving goods, it can serve other critical missions such as civil protection and public safety. This is the kind of technology that can transform whole economies.
At first, it didn't sound possible, but we keep proving it is, which is why we've called it ‚ÄúThe Black Swan‚Äù. It can land on short airstrips, enabling on-demand point-to-point flights and autonomous logistics even to the most remote locations that would otherwise take days to reach over ground or sea.
‚ÄãWe are starting with domestic air networks in Europe, bringing back to life the multitude of small airfields that are often unused, boosting local infrastructure and economies.

title: Internship - Research
description:
The Reality:
 We're not running a structured internship program. However, if your background is deeply connected to our work in AI for physical-world engineering - think computational fluid dynamics, multi-physics simulation, structural mechanics, or similar technical domains - we want to hear from you.
We're looking for exceptional people whose expertise aligns closely with what we're building, not general software engineering or AI internships.

title: Junior Energy Consultant
description:
About us
¬†
At Eneve, we build smart, data-driven software solutions for the energy market. Our platforms help suppliers, producers, and large-scale consumers stay ahead in a fast-changing landscape ‚Äî enabling future-proof products, automated processes, and stronger customer relationships. Powered by real-time data, AI-driven insights, and a growing international team across different countries, we simplify complexity and accelerate the energy transition.¬†
¬†
Want to be part of the flow? Join us
¬†
Eneve helps organizations in the energy sector manage complexity, drive efficiency, and accelerate the energy transition. As a 
Junior Energy Consultant
, you will join our team at the forefront¬†of energy, data, and technology. This role is a unique opportunity to grow your technical and consultancy skills while contributing directly to projects that shape the future of the energy market.
About the role
At Eneve, we work with a 
three-step approach
¬†to deliver value to our clients:
Designing solutions
¬†‚Äì Together with our clients, we explore opportunities, gather requirements, and design solutions using our proven product range and innovative prototyping. This leads to a high-level design and project plan that serves as¬†the foundation of our proposals.
Implementation
¬†‚Äì We refine, script, configure, deploy, release, train, and support clients in testing and acceptance. You‚Äôll be part of these project activities from the very beginning.
Ongoing support
¬†‚Äì¬†After implementation, solutions are transitioned¬†to our support teams. Operating in a DevOps environment, they provide continuous support through upgrades, incident management, and SLA monitoring.
As a Junior Consultant, you‚Äôll start with practical training about the energy market and our software platform 
EBASE
, including an in-house scripting course. You‚Äôll set your first steps as a consultant helping the customer to further optimize the use of our product. Within 2‚Äì4 weeks, you will join a client team and begin working on scripting assignments. By executing small technical tasks, you‚Äôll quickly learn to navigate EBASE and client interfaces, gradually building expertise while contributing to client satisfaction.
In this role, you‚Äôll be actively involved in a wide variety of tasks, from troubleshooting¬†and scripting¬†to analysis, client support, testing, and documentation. Depending on the team setup, you may also interact directly with clients. During the first year you will gradually take on more complex responsibilities, gain client-facing experience, and grow into a generalist with deep knowledge of our products and the energy market, with guidance from senior team members,
Typical tasks include:
Managing issues in EBASE, debugging scripts, and testing new releases
Designing small functionalities through fit-gap analysis (AS-IS vs. TO-BE)
Consulting on TO-BE situations after analyzing market documentation
Rolling out new releases
Providing ad hoc support to clients with operational issues

Was ist f√ºr dich drin?
Wir geben alles, um die Welt zu ver√§ndern, aber dabei vergessen wir nie, unsere Erfolge auch geb√ºhrend zu feiern! title: Operations Internship - Dutch Speaking
description:
About Fixico
We are Fixico, a fast-growing car damage repair marketplace, backed by world-class Silicon Valley-based investors, and scaling up rapidly throughout Europe. Trusted by fleet owners, leasing, rental, and insurance companies. Fixico has managed hundreds of thousands of repairs for companies ranging from the world's biggest brands to local players.
What you will be doing
As a Business Operations Intern you will be joining our Operations team. The team aims to provide the best possible support to our customers, partners and repair shops in our network. Main activities surround building long lasting relationships with stakeholders and aid in solving any problems that might arise.
You will handle all incoming and outgoing communication with our B2B clients Dutch speaking, arrange the best deals with repair shops for our B2B clients and handle questions from clients and drivers via mail, chat or phone. Next to that you are the one reaching out to clients to help them make a choice and book an appointment to repair their car damages.
We offer 
two internship cycles
, each lasting 
5-6 months
:
Fall Cycle:
 Starts in 
September
Spring Cycle:
 Starts in 
February or March
Your Responsibilities
Managing B2B accounts
Optimizing all processes and volumes for the accounts
Arrange the best and fastest quotes for our B2B clients
Processing all B2B damages, including quality assurance and damage reports
Onboarding new partnerships and educating your account on the best use of Fixico
Being the point of contact for all operational communication with partners and their drivers regarding damage repairs
Establishing and strengthening relationships with different partners, such as international leasing and rental companies
Ensuring a smooth and timely repair experience for our clients
Tracking and solving repair issues

title: Risk Manager (junior/medior)
description:
Risk Manager - 40 UUR¬†
Jij komt met scherpe analyses en bent communicatief vaardig. Jij wilt deel uitmaken van een gedreven team en samen ambitieuze doelen behalen. Tof! Floryn is op zoek naar een Risk Manager¬† om het Risk team te versterken. 
Floryn is een van de snelstgroeiende FinTechs van Nederland en binnenkort misschien wel van Europa! Anderen praten over innovatie in de financi√´le sector, 
Floryn doet het
. Met hun zelfontwikkelde technologie zetten ze de financi√´le wereld op zijn kop en helpen ze bedrijven van klein tot groot aan snel, eenvoudig en flexibel krediet.
Wat je als Risk Manager gaat doen
Floryn is in zes jaar gegroeid naar ruim 70 medewerkers - en die groei stopt voorlopig niet. Daarom zoeken we een ervaren Risk Manager ter versterking van het Risk-team. De exacte reden waarom Floryn jou hard nodig heeft als Risk Manager om het Risk team te versterken. Het team bestaat uit 10 man en speelt een essenti√´le rol om de ambitieuze doelstellingen te realiseren.¬†
In deze rol beheer en begeleid je klanten met een verhoogd risico. Jij zorgt voor een analyse van de risico‚Äôs van een krediet, gebaseerd op de beschikbare data (hiervoor gebruikt Floryn een slimme zelf ontwikkelde software) en je eigen inschatting van de klantsituaties. Ook ben jij verantwoordelijk voor het risicomanagement van je eigen kredietportefeuille, je schat daarbij het kredietrisico van klanten in en bewaakt deze. Het opstellen en uitvoeren van het behandelplan van klanten in zwaar weer hoort bij jouw taken.¬†
Daarnaast zorg jij voor:¬†¬†
De nakoming van de in het behandelplan opgenomen afspraken en de bijsturing indien nodig.¬†
Duidelijke en professionele communicatie met klanten, juristen en andere stakeholders.¬†
Een probleemloze overdracht van klanten van en naar Relatiemanagement.¬†
De samenwerking met het Sales team om samen Floryn tot een nog groter succes te maken.¬†
Het continu verbeteren en updaten van de procedures en technologie. Dit doe je ook als het je niet gevraagd wordt.¬†
Wat biedt Floryn¬†
Front-row seats bij een snelgroeiende Fintech. Jij krijgt de kans om je kennis te vergroten door samen te werken in een ambitieus en enorm getalenteerd team.
Een bruto salaris van ‚Ç¨4.000 - ‚Ç¨6.000 obv 40 uur afhankelijk van ervaring.¬†
30 vakantiedagen, 8% vakantiegeld en uitstekende reiskostenvergoeding (‚Ç¨ 0,23 of 1e klas treinkaart) maar daarnaast alle mogelijkheid om ook enkele dagen vanuit huis te werken.¬†
Een mooi kantoor en werkomgeving met goede koffie + Bourgondische lunch in de gezellig binnenstad van ‚Äòs-Hertogenbosch.¬†
Een MacBook Pro en werkelijk alle gear die je nodig hebt.¬†
Veel teamactiviteiten, van borrels tot leuke uitjes. En om in je eigen tijd actief bezig te blijven, krijg je ‚Ç¨ 30 voor een sportabonnement.¬†
Iets extra‚Äôs in gedachten? Vraag het Floryn!

title: Junior UX Designer
description:
Who are we?
At Flying Bisons, we‚Äôre building Europe‚Äôs leading 
Strategic Design & Implementation consultancy
 ‚Äî delivering the quality, rigor, and impact you‚Äôd expect from top-tier consulting firms, but fully specialized in digital products and transformation. With a rapidly growing presence in the Middle East, we partner with enterprises and governments on their most high-stakes initiatives, shaping platforms and services used by tens of millions of people.
Our work directly influences how 
millions of people around the globe
 live, work, and interact with digital services.¬†
Public Platforms
 ‚Äî defining how 15+ million citizens and 1+ million businesses interact with the labor market in Saudi Arabia.
Banking & Finance
 ‚Äî building digital platforms for the largest banks in Europe and Saudi Arabia.
Telecommunications
 ‚Äî shaping customer experiences for telcos with a combined 150+ million subscribers.
Education
 ‚Äî working with the Ministry of Education in Saudi Arabia, the largest ministry in the country, on its digital transformation.
Media
 ‚Äî partnering with leading media platforms in Poland and Europe with a total reach of tens of millions.
Consumer & Retail
 ‚Äî from KFC and Hebe to NaTemat and Enel-Med, creating products used daily by millions.
Our uniqueness comes from going beyond design craft. As we wrote in our manifestos ‚Äî 
Strategic Design - Manifest
 and
 
Strategic Design - The Future of Design
 
‚Äî 
design craft is only 10% of success
. The other 90% ‚Äî the 
Invisible 90%
 ‚Äî is about navigating politics, aligning stakeholders, and protecting fragile visions until they reach reality.
That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre building the discipline of 
Strategic Design
 ‚Äî and we want you to be part of it.

description:
Framestore Los Angeles is looking for forward-thinking, creatively driven individuals to join our Visual Development team for a 4-month paid internship.

Throughout the program, you‚Äôll gain hands-on experience working alongside experienced artists and creative technologists, participate in project reviews, and contribute to the development of visual concepts and exploratory workflows.
The internship will start on June 8, 2026 and finish on September 25, 2026.
Internships will ideally follow a hybrid model. While we are open to remote candidates based in the U.S., preference will be given to those within a commutable distance to our Santa Monica studio, as some onsite presence would be beneficial. Candidates must have reliable internet access for remote workdays and be able to work standard Pacific Time zone business hours.

title: (Junior) Douane Declarant
description:
Ben jij nauwkeurig, analytisch en krijg je energie van het begeleiden van logistieke processen over de grens? Heb je al basiskennis van douaneprocessen en wil je je verder ontwikkelen tot zelfstandig declarant? Dan zijn wij op zoek naar jou voor de functie van 
(Junior) Douane Declarant 
binnen ons team in Nederland, onderdeel van een internationale groep die scheepvaart-, logistieke en maritieme diensten aanbiedt.
¬†
Je werkt in een dynamische omgeving waarin je ervoor zorgt dat douaneformaliteiten correct en tijdig worden afgehandeld. Je werkt zelfstandig aan aangiftes, schakelt veel met collega‚Äôs van de exportafdeling en denkt mee over procesverbeteringen.
¬†
Wat ga je doen?
In deze veelzijdige functie ben je verantwoordelijk voor:
Het zelfstandig voorbereiden van douaneaangiftes (import, export en transit).
Het controleren van documenten zoals facturen, paklijsten en vervoersdocumenten.
Het uitvoeren van wekelijkse checks in ons douanesysteem.
Het signaleren van fouten of risico‚Äôs en hier direct op acteren.
Het oplossen van operationele vraagstukken die tijdens zendingen ontstaan.
Het meedenken over slimmer en effici√´nter inrichten van douaneprocessen.
Intensieve samenwerking met de exportafdeling om het proces soepel te laten verlopen.
Deze functie biedt de mogelijkheid om je te ontwikkelen tot volledig zelfstandig declarant.

description:
Keen to contribute to the success of dynamic businesses while quickly flourishing under the wings of experienced colleagues? Then this job is just right for you! Local SMEs, Belgian establishments and multinationals‚Ä¶ our clients all count on your expertise.

Our Junior VAT Consultants are responsible for a varied range of tasks. Here's a taste of what you can expect:
Within the Tax department, you will act as a
 trusted advisor
 to our clients.
You offer support and 
high-quality technical advice
 on VAT to a diverse clientele, at the office or at the client‚Äôs premises.
You work on specific 
VAT projects in the context of implementation, optimisation, regularisation and/or screening
.

VAT inspections 
and you guide the client through 
regularisations
.
You guide and control 
compliance files
, both for Belgian requirements and for international requirements.
Furthermore, you support the further development of the VAT practice in our tax department.

title: Spontaneous application - Internship
description:
In order to incorporate practical experience in your academic career, Grant Thornton offers you the opportunity to join our professional teams on a traineeship. This first practical experience will introduce you to the colourful world of audit, accountancy, tax, legal or advisory. You will come into contact with clients, both small SMEs and large, international companies. Profile
You are in your last year of higher economic education
You have a strong interest in finance combined with an enthusiastic personality and team player mentality.
Knowledge of current IT applications and Excel is recommended.
Offer
We offer you a unique opportunity to be part of Grant Thornton Belgium's ambitious growth project and associate your name with a world-class consultancy firm.
We are an organisation with room for initiative, attention for personal development and a healthy work-life balance.
You will be part of an excellent team that works closely together with and for our clients.
Place of employment
: one of the Grant Thonthon offices in Belgium or at the client's premises
Internship duration
: minimum 1 month and minimum 4 days a week
Extra
: There will also be room for guidance in preparing your thesis and you can call on the knowledge of our more experienced employees

title: Junior Banking & Cash Officer
description:
G4S, an Allied
 Universal ¬Æ company, is the world‚Äôs leading international security solutions group. We are currently seeking a motivated and detail-oriented 
Junior Banking & Cash¬† Officer
 to join our Finance team in Metamorfosi.
In this role, you will report to the Finance Manager and handle the day-to-day flow of financial transactions, with a particular focus on bank guarantees and payment reconciliations.
Job Responsibilities:
Manage daily bookkeeping tasks and process Accounts Payable/Receivable transactions
Perform bank reconciliations and ensure all financial systems remain aligned
Assist in the administration of the Bank Guarantee lifecycle (issuance, amendments, and cancellations) according to contract terms

title: Junior Project Analyst
description:
Bouw mee aan scherpe projectsturing in de energietransitie!
HoSt is een internationaal opererende, technologiegedreven organisatie in de energietransitie. Vanuit Nederland ontwikkelen, bouwen en exploiteren wij oplossingen voor bio-energie, biogas en duurzame warmte. Met teams Nederland, Frankrijk, de Verenigde Staten, Polen en Letland en projecten in heel Europa en Amerika groeit HoSt snel en internationaal. Onze ambitie is groot: 25 miljoen ton CO‚ÇÇ-reductie realiseren via onze projecten en installaties wereldwijd.
Die groei vraagt om steeds betere financi√´le sturing van onze projecten. Niet alleen achteraf rapporteren, maar begrijpen wat er gebeurt, daarvan leren en dit vertalen naar betere keuzes. Daarom breiden we ons team Business Control uit met een 
Junior
 
Project Analyst
.
De Functie
Als Junior Project Analyst rapporteer je aan de 
Manager Business Control
 en werk je nauw samen met het team Business Control, de teams in de Business Units en de directie. Dit is een junior ontwikkelrol voor iemand die zich graag breed wil ontwikkelen en interesse heeft in het snijvlak van business, finance en data.
Je helpt projectinformatie te structureren, voert analyses uit op project- en portfolio‚Äëniveau en draagt bij aan betere rapportages en dashboards. Binnen de projecten wordt gebruikt gemaakt van onze innovatieve oplossingen, wat initi√´le begrotingen soms minder voorspelbaar maakt. Juist daarom is het belangrijk om snel te leren van de praktijk en inzichten effectief terug te brengen in nieuwe keuzes en ramingen.
Dit is nadrukkelijk een functie waarin je leert door te doen: je krijgt verantwoordelijkheid, begeleiding en veel ruimte om jezelf professioneel en persoonlijk te ontwikkelen. Afhankelijk van jouw interesse en ontwikkeling kun je doorgroeien richting business control, project control of andere finance- en analyse-rollen binnen HoSt.
Wat ga je doen
Je ondersteunt Business Control en directie met analyses die direct bijdragen aan betere projectsturing en scherpere commerci√´le keuzes. De kern van de rol is het versterken en verkorten van de feedback loop: leren van project-actuals en deze inzichten terugbrengen naar commercie en nieuwe begrotingen.
Je houdt je onder andere bezig met:
Uitvoeren van diepgaande financi√´le analyses op individuele projecten (w.o. tijd, kosten, scope, kwaliteit);
Analyseren hoe projecten en begrotingsposten zich financieel ontwikkelen na contractering, inclusief afwijkingen ten opzichte van de initi√´le begroting;
Signaleren van risico‚Äôs, knelpunten en afwijkingen binnen de projecten;
Inzichtelijk maken waar en waarom marge onder druk komt of juist beter uitpakt en hoe we dat verbeteren;
Opstellen van project- en portfolio-analyses die patronen en trends zichtbaar maken;
Vertalen van project-actuals naar concrete inzichten voor nieuwe calculaties en commerci√´le besluitvorming, in samenwerking met business control en commercie;
Bijdragen aan heldere rapportages en dashboards (o.a. Power BI) die deze inzichten ondersteunen.

title: Junior Electrical Engineer
description:
Start your career as an Junior Electrical Engineer and work on technology that supports the global energy transition.
About us
Bright Renewables
 is a technology provider specializing in renewable gas and CO‚ÇÇ capture solutions. We deliver complete, innovative energy projects used worldwide. Bright Renewables is part of the HoSt Group, a Dutch, family-owned company and a global leader in renewable energy technology.
We are proud winners of the FD Gazelle Silver Award and the Oryx Prize
,
 recognizing us as one of the most inspiring companies in the Netherlands.
Why choose Bright Renewables?
Because you start your engineering career working on real energy projects that contribute to the energy transition. 
You‚Äôll be given trust, responsibility, and strong guidance to help you develop your technical skills in an international and supportive environment.
Your role as a 
Junior Electrical Engineer
As a Junior Electrical Engineer, you will work closely with experienced Electrical and Software Engineers and gradually take on more responsibility. You report to the Manager of E&I and Software and learn by working on real projects from day one.
You‚Äôll be based in Enschede, working alongside more than 400 colleagues. From mid-2026, you‚Äôll move to a brand-new, sustainably built office in Hengelo. You will also support our partner in Poland during container construction and commissioning, giving you valuable international exposure early in your career.
What this means for you:
You receive hands-on training, clear guidance, and the opportunity to grow into a fully independent Electrical Engineer in a future-proof industry
You responsibilities 
Support senior engineers with preparing RFQs and evaluating technical offers;
Assist in communication with clients and suppliers;
Collaborate with Electrical and Software Engineering teams in the Netherlands and Poland;
Prepare load lists, network diagrams, cable lists, and electrical documentation;
Review electrical schematics together with experienced engineers;
Support ATEX and SIL calculations;
Provide technical support during commissioning and start-up of installations.

title: Internship: Everybody Gets Home Safe Everyday
Internships Bright
description:
These assignments are for the internship period starting in 2026.
For the Bright department
 we are looking for interns! The following internships / graduation assignments are available. Apply using the apply button and select the (graduation)¬†internship¬†you are interested in.
The internships on this page are:
1: 
Ergonomic and Maintainability Assessment of Biogas Upgrading and CO‚ÇÇ Liquefaction Plants;
2: Transient system model;
3: Upgrader Test Setup Pre-treatment Compact.
1 Ergonomic and Maintainability Assessment of Biogas Upgrading and CO‚ÇÇ Liquefaction Plants
Suitable for BSc and MSc in 
Industrial design engineer, ¬†Industrieel Product Ontwerpen (IPO) or any other studies that involve ergonomic studies
The intern will assess the ergonomic design, reachability, and maintainability of existing biogas upgrading and CO‚ÇÇ liquefaction installations. Systems will be evaluated against relevant occupational health and safety standards (e.g., ARBO norms). Based on findings, the intern will develop improvement proposals and design recommendations to enhance serviceability, safety, and operational efficiency.
Your tasks:
Review current Biogas upgrading and CO2 liquefaction plants based on reachability and maintainability and come with proposals of an improved design;
Test current service and maintenance procedures with respect to applicable standards (ARBO for example).
‚Äî
2 Transient system model.
Suitable for 
MSc in Chemical Engineering / Mechanical Engineering / Sustainable Energy
In this assignment you will work on the development of a fully dynamic model of the methanol reactor system in development at Bright Renewables. Continuing from work of previous interns your task will be to integrated the stand alone models in a total system, and find the appropriate control strategy.
Your tasks:
Complete dynamical models of sub systems;
Develop integrated model of al dynamic sub-models;
Set-up control system for the overall plant;
Analyse results and develop control strategies.
‚Äî
3 Upgrader Test Setup Pre-treatment Compact.
Suitable for 
BSc / MSc / MBO-4
 
in Electrical
 
Engineering
For the redesign of our Upgrader Compact we would like to have an easy way of testing the pre-treatment skid. For this we would like to have a small test panel been made that can be easily connected to this skid. You will be working in the E&I and Software department of Bright Renewables.
Your tasks:
Analyze the new pre-treatment skid;
Design a test panel;
Get the test panel build;
Perform the actual test.

title: Internship - Automotive Sales & Product Trainer - Belgium
description:
Ontdek jouw toekomst in de Automotive Sector!
Ben jij een laatstejaarsstudent met een passie voor innovatie, technologie en mobiliteit? Zoek jij nog een stageplek die echt in jou investeert & waar je de kans krijgt om aan interessante projecten te werken? 
Bij 
IAS (Innovative Automotive Services)
 krijg je de kans om √©cht impact te maken! Ontdek hoe jouw talent bijdraagt aan de toekomst van mobiliteit en leer van de beste in de automotive sector.
Over IAS
IAS is d√© toonaangevende partner in Learning & Development binnen de automotive wereld. Wij werken samen met topmerken om innovatieve, wetenschappelijk onderbouwde trainingsoplossingen te cre√´ren. 
Ons geheim? Ons toffe team! Als echte 'employees-first'-organisatie zetten wij onze mensen op de eerste plaats. Bij IAS draait alles om creativiteit, FUN, ondernemerschap, innovatie, integriteit en persoonlijke groei.
Wat mag je verwachten tijdens je stage?
Meewerken aan innovatieve projecten
: Samen met onze technische trainers en projectmanagers ontwikkel je leeroplossingen die √©cht het verschil maken in de automotive sector.
Hands-on ervaring
: Geen koffie halen of kopietjes maken bij ons! Jij werkt actief mee aan trainingen, analyses en het opstellen van opleidingsmateriaal.
Kennismaken met internationale klanten
: Je krijgt de kans om te werken met toonaangevende automerken.
Coaching en begeleiding
: We laten je niet verdrinken. Je wordt begeleid door ervaren professionals en krijgt de kans om jouw talenten verder te ontwikkelen.
Wat bieden wij jou?
Een kick start voor jouw carri√®re, inclusief mentor, toffe collega‚Äôs, een leerrijk plan & dat in een dynamische, internationale werkomgeving.
Een fijne balans tussen leren, ervaring op doen en plezier maken: bij ons staat FUN hoog op de agenda!
Flexibele werkuren en de mogelijkheid om remote te werken.
Een uitdagende stageperiode & toffe projecten om je tanden in te zetten.
Toffe events: zoals overheerlijke BBQ‚Äôs tijdens de middag, teambuildings op het strand, gamen tijdens de middag (met of zonder VR bril), afterwork drinks (en zoveel meer, ‚Ä¶).
Bij IAS maken we samen het verschil. Spring jij mee aan boord? üöó‚ú®
Solliciteer vandaag nog online en geef jouw carri√®re een crazy boost!

title: Junior Consultant Cyber Security
description:
Word een vertrouwde security-adviseur!
Kick-start je cybersecurity carri√®re in een team waarin je snel leert, vrij kunt groeien en echte impact maakt. Ons Cybersecurity-team groeit hard! We zoeken junior consultants die snel willen ontwikkelen tot allround security-adviseurs. Binnen het team werk je aan een breed scala aan cybersecurityprojecten binnen Financial Services, Healthcare en Retail, ondersteund door collega‚Äôs die geven om jouw ontwikkeling en welzijn.
Deze rol is ideaal als je snel wilt leren,  aan verschillende soorten opdrachten wilt bijdragen en wilt doorgroeien naar volwaardig cybersecurity expert. 
Jouw impact
IG&H werkt voor toonaangevende organisaties in sectoren zoals pensioenen, verzekeringen, retail en gezondheidszorg. Als junior krijg je de mogelijkheid om mee te bouwen aan veilige, toekomstbestendige digitale omgevingen samen met ervaren security specialisten. Jij draagt bij aan de digitale veiligheid van onze klanten √©n van IG&H zelf, terwijl jij je vakmanschap ontwikkelt.
Wat je gaat doen
Je ondersteunt en voert cybersecurity werk uit binnen meerdere opdrachten, waaronder:
Ondersteunen van cybersecurity-assessments en risicoanalyses
Technische bevindingen vertalen naar duidelijke, aanbevelingen
Helpen bij het ontwerpen van veilige architecturen of security-verbeteringen
Samenwerken met senior consultants voor end-to-end delivery
Leren adviseren van management over securitybeslissingen en roadmaps
Je maakt niet alleen slides; je helpt bij het leveren van praktische uitvoering, tastbare verbeteringen en echte verandering bij klanten.

title: Junior Data Engineer
description:
Bij IG&H helpen we onze klanten om voorop te blijven lopen in hun markt. Dat doen we door slimme technologie, data en consultancy te combineren in een wereld die continu verandert. We werken samen, doorbreken silo‚Äôs en bouwen oplossingen waar organisaties √©cht verder mee komen. Sta jij aan het begin van je carri√®re als Data Engineer en wil je hieraan bijdragen? Dan maken we graag kennis met je.
We zijn op zoek naar een Data Engineer om datagedreven producten te ontwerpen, te bouwen en een nieuwe databackbone te cre√´ren voor onze data science-projecten. De Data Engineer zal de lead nemen om onze klanten naar het volgende niveau van datahandling en data-automatiseringsmogelijkheden te brengen. Verder zal je (technische) leiderschapsvaardigheden, ervaring en visie toepassen om effici√´nte datatoepassingen te cre√´ren.¬†¬†
Wij zoeken iemand die:
Onder begeleiding meewerkt aan het ontwerpen en bouwen van herbruikbare datamodellen en data-oplossingen
Datapijplijnen ontwikkelt of onderhoudt (zoals ETL/ELT-processen) en meewerkt aan het opzetten van data lakes en data warehouses
Interesse heeft in het toepassen van analysemethoden en deze stap voor stap in de praktijk leert gebruiken
Wil leren werken met cloudinfrastructuur en bijbehorende data-platformen
Zich wil ontwikkelen binnen een commercieel gerichte en/of consultingomgeving
Graag samenwerkt in teamverband met collega‚Äôs met verschillende expertises
Zich prettig voelt in een omgeving met gemotiveerde mensen die samen streven naar hoge kwaliteit voor klanten
Over het Data & AI team
¬†
Wij helpen onze klanten innoveren en gebruikmaken van de nieuwste data- en AI-technologie. Het Data & AI-team bestaat uit 30 data-experts (Data Scientisten, Analisten en Consultants) die nauw samenwerken met de 30 engineers in ons Technology-team en nog eens 20 datawetenschappers bij de zusterbedrijven van IG&H. Het team levert data science en analytische projecten en heeft in de afgelopen twee jaar meer dan 40 (Gen)AI-projecten gerealiseerd voor onze klanten in Retail, Financial Services en Health.

title: Junior Consultant Financial Services
description:
Wil je je carri√®re een goede kickstart geven door te starten in consultancy? Als Business Analyst Financial Services bij IG&H maak je impact bij toonaangevende, financi√´le dienstverleners en organisaties in Nederland. Je helpt deze organisaties om in te spelen op nieuwe ontwikkelingen en om te gaan met uitdagingen in de markt. Als integraal onderdeel van een team van consultants krijg je vanaf dag √©√©n verantwoordelijkheid: of je nu werkt aan de strategie van onze klanten, gegeven adviezen implementeert of nieuwe oplossingen integreert.
Wat ga je doen?
 
Samen met collega's werk je aan strategieontwikkeling, het integreren van nieuwe oplossingen en digitaliseringsinitiatieven die invloed hebben op financi√´le diensten of producten. Als Junior Consultant Financial Services maak je deel uit van een team van sector-experts dat onze klanten in verzekeringen, pensioenen en banken begeleidt bij hun (digitale) transformatie. We ondersteunen hen bij het transformeren van hun praktijken om concurrerend te blijven en om te gaan met uitdagingen, zoals voortdurend veranderende regelgeving. Je raakt bekend met de nieuwste innovaties op het gebied van data en technologie die als versnellers kunnen worden gebruikt om financi√´le diensten te verbeteren.
Tijdens deze projecten houd je je bezig met klant- en marktanalyse, het voorbereiden van adviesrapporten, het geven van presentaties en workshops, het onderhouden van regelmatig contact met je projectteam en natuurlijk het interacteren met klanten en stakeholders.
Naast het werken met collega's binnen Advisory, kun je deel uitmaken van een 
smart collaboration
 met consultants van andere disciplines, zoals Business Engineering, Data & AI of Transformation, om zo langdurige impact te maken bij en voor onze klanten. Intern werk je vanuit het IG&H-kantoor, ontwikkel je nieuwe voorstellen en draag je bij aan de expertise van het bedrijf.
Wat levert het jou op?
¬†
Werken bij IG&H zal je carri√®re een vliegende start geven door een steile leercurve. Naast leren op de werkvloer zijn er volop trainingsmogelijkheden om je kernvaardigheden op het gebied van consultancy en interpersoonlijke vaardigheden te versterken via onze Junior Academy. Je krijgt toegewezen coaches die je begeleiden. Daarnaast biedt IG&H een inspirerend kantoor in Utrecht, een positieve werksfeer, leuke teamactiviteiten en sportevenementen.¬†
"Bij IG&H kun je je persoonlijke en professionele ontwikkeling versnellen in een ondersteunende en veilige omgeving. Je wordt omringd door intelligente collega's die je dagelijks uitdagen, terwijl je ook de vrijheid hebt om je eigen leerpad vorm te geven. Binnen FS word je blootgesteld aan de nieuwste ontwikkelingen en trends, waardoor je een sector-expert wordt en dus over de juiste kennis beschikt om bedrijven te helpen voorop te blijven lopen."
 Samuel Tielkes (Consultant Financial Services)
"
Bij IG&H voel je je meteen welkom als je begint. Er zijn veel leuke evenementen om je collega's te leren kennen; georganiseerd zowel door het bedrijf als door collega's zelf. Binnen het FS-team wissel je als consulant tussen projecten die gericht zijn op de verzekerings-, bank- en pensioensector. Dit stelt je in staat om je te verdiepen in de verschillende sectoren en te ontdekken waar je interesses liggen. Samen met collega's van het FS-team (en competentieteams) werk je naar een succesvol resultaat."
 Iris B√∂hm (Consultant Financial Services)

title: Junior Novulo Developer
description:
Heb jij een passie voor IT en wil je bijdragen aan het transformeren van de verzekeringsbranche? Ben jij een leergierige en ambitieuze starter die wil groeien in een dynamische rol bij een organisatie zoals IG&H?
¬†
Wij zijn op zoek naar een 
Junior Novulo ontwikkelaar
 met basiskennis van IT, die graag wil ontwikkelen. IT-ervaring kan natuurlijk ook opgedaan zijn buiten een studie, bouwde jij als tiener de mooiste apps schroom dan niet om je toch te solliciteren!¬†Als onderdeel van ons Insurance Solution team help je mee aan het bouwen van innovatieve verzekeringsoplossingen met behulp van onder andere Novulo, een composable lowcode platform. Dit platform stelt ons in staat om de bedrijfsprocessen van onze klanten te automatiseren, te ontsluiten via API‚Äôs en te digitaliseren. Je krijgt training van onze Novulo experts en gaat samen met jouw collega‚Äôs de ontwikkelreis aan!¬†
Op inhoud ondersteun je bij het ontwerpen en ontwikkelen van onze solutions. Je denkt mee over de juiste compositie en werkt in multidisciplinaire IG&H teams samen, om organisaties te helpen te veranderen!

title: Junior Consultant Retail & Products
description:
Wil jij je carri√®re in consultancy een vliegende start geven?
Als Business Analyst Retail & Products bij IG&H maak je impact bij toonaangevende Nederlandse bedrijven in de retail- en consumentengoederensector. Je helpt deze organisaties om in te spelen op nieuwe ontwikkelingen en om te gaan met uitdagingen in de markt. Als integraal onderdeel van een team van consultants krijg je vanaf dag √©√©n verantwoordelijkheid: of je nu werkt aan de strategie van de klant, het implementeren van advies of het integreren van nieuwe oplossingen.
Wat ga je doen?
Binnen het Retail & Products-team word je onderdeel van een diverse groep van getalenteerde en gedreven mensen, met wie je nauw samenwerkt om onze klanten optimaal te bedienen.
Er is geen ‚Äòtypisch‚Äô project binnen het team. Door nauwe samenwerking met andere expertteams binnen IG&H kunnen we onze klanten helpen met vrijwel elke uitdaging in het competitieve retaillandschap. Van strategieontwikkeling tot implementatie en integratie van in-house ontwikkelde oplossingen. We zijn trots op onze end-to-end transformaties en op het feit dat we echt een partner zijn voor onze klanten tijdens deze reis. In je eerste twee jaar als analist bij IG&H krijg je de kans om aan een breed scala aan projecten te werken, zodat je je vaardigheden optimaal kunt ontwikkelen.

Naast het samenwerken met collega‚Äôs uit de adviespraktijk, werk je mogelijk ook samen met consultants uit andere disciplines zoals Business Engineering, Data & AI of Transformation om de klant optimaal te ondersteunen.
Naast klantprojecten werk je ook op kantoor aan nieuwe voorstellen en draag je bij aan de expertise van IG&H.

Naast uitstekende arbeidsvoorwaarden biedt werken bij IG&H je een steile leercurve aan het begin van je carri√®re. Daarnaast biedt IG&H je een inspirerend kantoor in Utrecht, een onge√´venaarde werksfeer, en volop feestjes, teamactiviteiten en sportevenementen.
