title: Junior Industrial Designer
description:
ABOUT US
With a global team of beauty experts and a distinctly personal approach, IBG empowers all its clients ‚Äì from established beauty brands to first-time private label retailers ‚Äì with strategic partnerships that bring visions to life, and products seamlessly to market.
Consisting of three key brands - FASTEN Packaging, Orchard Custom Beauty, and Roberts Beauty - IBG helps businesses create quality beauty products. From concept and design to getting products on shelves and online, we can support retailers, brands, and wholesalers with everything they need to get ready for retail.
IBG is in search of a 
Junior Industrial Designer
 who is passionate about design in the beauty packaging space. The ideal candidate should have a sense of curiosity, collaborative spirit, and positive attitude.
Curious
 - You often find yourself lost in beauty/retail store aisles observing new packaging and innovative gestures. Our ideal candidate will look deep within what drives the aesthetic and function of beauty packaging on the market.
Collaborative
 ‚Äì You openly share your new ideas with others and are very receptive to different types of feedback. We win as one team and use each designer‚Äôs unique point of view to help better inform our design decisions.
Positive Attitude
 ‚Äì Industrial design in beauty packaging has it‚Äôs own unique obstacles. The ideal candidate will remain positive when presented with design challenges during the packaging design development process. ¬†
IN THIS ROLE, YOU WILL:
Brainstorm new innovative beauty packaging designs with a cross functional-collaborative team.
Sketch and produce 3D mockups and present to internal teams and in client meetings.
Execute your own design research and beauty brand analysis. 
Closely collaborate with engineering during design development stages.
Create 3D printed parts for internal evaluation and client presentations. 
Maintain awareness of design trends and influences in the beauty packaging space and other industrials.

title: Internship offer - Multimodal Data Analysis Using Drone-Based Multispectral and LiDAR Systems for Smart Agriculture
description:
CONTEXT¬†:
Public establishment belonging to IMT (Institut Mines-T√©l√©com), placed under the supervision of the Ministry of Economy, Finance and Industrial and Digital Sovereignty, IMT Nord Europe has three main objectives: providing our students with ethically responsible engineering practice enabling them to solve 21st century issues, carrying out our R&D activities leading to outstanding innovations and supporting territorial development through innovation and entrepreneurship. Ideally positioned at the heart of Europe, 1 hour away from Paris, 30 min from Brussels and 1h30 from London, IMT Nord Europe has strong ambitions to become a main actor of the current industrial transitions, digital and environmental, by combining education and research on engineering and digital technologies.
Located on two main campuses dedicated to research and education in Douai and Lille, IMT Nord Europe offers research facilities of almost 20,000m¬≤ in the following areas:
¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Digital science,
¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Energy and Environment,
¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Materials and Processes.
¬†
For more details, visit the School‚Äôs website : 
www.imt-nord-europe.fr
Scientific Context:
Precision agriculture aims to optimize the use of inputs by integrating a wide range of sensing and data analysis technologies. Drones equipped with multispectral and LiDAR sensors offer complementary views of crop structure and physiology, while ground and weather data provide essential environmental context. Combining these heterogeneous sources enables a deeper understanding of the agroecosystem and supports AI-driven decision-making for precision irrigation.
This internship is part of the industrial chair POMME d‚ÄôAPI, which brings together IMT Nord Europe, Polytech Lille, DOWNS, and Osiris Agriculture. Built around two PhD projects, the chair mobilizes the expertise of each laboratory and company to develop cutting-edge technologies for data acquisition, processing, and fusion aimed at improving the conditioning and irrigation of potato crops and making production more sustainable.
Osiris Agriculture is a human-scale company and an ambitious technological venture. With two pre-industrial versions deployed in 2024, its autonomous irrigation robot OSCAR is capable of delivering the precise daily dose of inputs (water and fertilizers) needed for optimal plant development.
This internship contributes directly to that effort by combining aerial (drone-based) and ground-level sensing to better understand and model crop‚Äìsoil‚Äìweather interactions under real field conditions, particularly in potato test plots.
Objectives:
Develop a research-oriented workflow for multisource data acquisition, processing, analysis, and multimodal modeling. The main objectives include:
¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Design and execute data acquisition campaigns using drones (multispectral, LiDAR) coordinated with ground measurements and weather data streams.
¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Develop calibration and synchronization protocols to ensure consistency across sensors and sources (intrinsic/extrinsic calibration, precise timestamping, GPS/IMU alignment).
¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Implement preprocessing and cleaning pipelines (radiometric, geometric, and temporal corrections) for analysis-ready datasets.
¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Conduct exploratory and statistical data analysis; extract biophysical indicators per modality (e.g., vegetation indices, canopy height models).
¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Build and evaluate a multimodal model integrating aerial, ground, and environmental data to characterize field conditions and support precision irrigation decisions (example model to explore: XGBoost).
Research Contributions:
The internship will contribute to ongoing research on multisensor calibration, data fusion, and multimodal learning for smart farming. The work will investigate alignment strategies and fusion schemes (early/late fusion) that combine spectral, structural (3D), and environmental variables to interpret crop status and ecosystem dynamics; results may support future publications within the PhD framework.
Expected Outcomes
¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† A validated multisource data acquisition protocol integrating aerial, ground, and weather data.
¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† A harmonized multimodal dataset (multispectral imagery, LiDAR point clouds, ground measurements, and weather records) with complete metadata.
¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† A research prototype of a multimodal fusion or predictive model for field ecosystem analysis, with baseline performance and ablation studies.
¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† A technical and scientific report documenting methodology, experiments, and results, with recommendations for PhD continuation.

title: Internship Master "An Evaluation Framework for Process Modeling Languages: An Extension Incorporating the Flexibility, Resilience, and Trustworthiness of Industrial Processes"
description:
Institut Mines-T√©l√©com is the leading public group of engineering and management Grandes √âcoles in France. Consisting of eight public graduate Grandes √âcoles and two subsidiary graduate schools, Institut Mines-T√©l√©com leads and develops a rich ecosystem of partner schools, economic, academic and institutional partners, key players in education, research and economic development.
Mines Saint-√âtienne, a graduate school of the Institut Mines-T√©l√©com, is responsible for education, research, innovation, industrial transfer and scientific culture dissemination. With 2,500 students, 500 staff and a budget of ‚Ç¨50m, it has 3 campuses dedicated to the industry of the future, health and well-being, and digital sovereignty and microelectronics. It is ranked in the top 15 graduate engineering schools in France and the top 500 universities worldwide.
üó∫Ô∏è Description
 
This internship takes place in the context of the ANR/FAPESP international collaboration project Normative Artificial Intelligence for regulating MANufacturing (
NAIMAN
).
Modern manufacturing industries are compelled to become more flexible, adaptable, resilient, sustainable, and human-centred in order to evolve and remain competitive. The digital transformation of the manufacturing systems, from business models to machines at the shop floor, provides a nurturing environment for the implementation of these necessary properties. However, these properties also influence the requirements imposed on process modeling techniques used to represent and analyze these industrial processes.
Process modeling encompasses a wide array of concepts, methods, and graphical notations designed to represent and analyze the behavior of complex processes. Fundamentally, process modeling serves as a cognitive design instrument that facilitates understanding current organizational practices and exploring potential future processes. Process models are created using modeling languages (also referred to as notations) that define constructs and rules for using these constructs. Selecting a suitable process modeling language that can accurately express the characteristics of industrial processes still presents a challenge because of the large number of alternatives, each with numerous features.
Some process modeling languages have been extended to support the representation of flexibility, resilience, trustworthiness and sustainability and several approaches have been proposed to evaluate these properties of industrial processes. But, to our knowledge, there are no studies that evaluate the ability of process modeling languages to represent these properties of industrial processes.
We have proposed an evaluation framework to assess process modeling languages in terms of their expressiveness for representing the resilience of industrial processes. This framework was developed to formulate clear and specific requirements regarding the resilience characteristics that process modeling languages should be able to represent.
Objectives
This internship aims to extend this evaluation framework to assess process modeling languages in terms of their expressiveness for representing the flexibility, trustworthiness and sustainability of industrial processes. Then, this extended evaluation framework will be used for assessing a set of industrial process modeling languages. The outcome of this assessment will be used to select a language for modeling an educational skateboard manufacturing assembly line implementing a product-centric production approach (i.e., 
F√°brica do Futuro@USP
).
Responsibilites
 
Extend the conceptual evaluation framework for flexibility, trustworthiness and sustainability of industrial processes
Define metrics for measuring the expressiveness of process modeling languages concerning resilience, flexibility, trustworthiness and sustainability of industrial processes
Evaluate existing process modeling languages using the proposed evaluation framework
Model the F√°brica do 
Futuro@USP
 assembly line using a process modeling language
Write reports about the evolution and final outcomes of the framework development and application
Keywords : 
Modeling Process Languages, Design Science Research, Industrial Engineering.

title: Internship offer: Source apportionment and exposure assessment of urban aerosols
description:
Context:
IMT Nord Europe is a public higher-education and research institution belonging to the Institut Mines-T√©l√©com (IMT) group, under the supervision of the French Ministry of Industry. Its missions include engineering education, scientific research, and innovation in support of sustainable territorial development.
For more details, please visit: 
www.imt-nord-europe.fr/en
This internship will be carried out within the CERI EE at IMT Nord Europe, in the research axis 
‚ÄúObservations, Sources and Processes in the Atmosphere‚Äù (OSPA)
. The host team develops advanced experimental and data-analysis approaches to characterize atmospheric aerosols, their sources, and their impacts on air quality and health.
The work is embedded in the framework of the RESILIENCE project, a national transdisciplinary research initiative addressing urban environmental quality and exposure issues, relying on advanced atmospheric observations performed at the ATOLL (ATmospheric Observations in liLLe) platform, part of the European ACTRIS research infrastructure.
Brief role description:
Urban air pollution remains a major environmental and public-health challenge. Beyond particle mass concentrations, recent research highlights the importance of chemical composition, emission sources and particle size distributions in determining exposure and health relevance.
This internship focuses on the analysis of high-time-resolution atmospheric aerosol datasets, including chemical speciation, black carbon, trace metals and particle size distributions. The intern will contribute to ongoing research activities related to the characterization of urban aerosol sources and their temporal variability.
The position is intended for students seeking research-oriented training in atmospheric sciences and environmental data analysis.
Main tasks
Under the supervision of the research team, the intern will:
Conduct a literature review on aerosol chemical composition, source apportionment and exposure-related indicators
Participate in data pre-processing and quality control (QA/QC) of real-time atmospheric measurements
Perform exploratory data analysis of aerosol chemical and physical properties
Apply or test multivariate statistical tools (e.g. receptor models)
Assist in the preparation of figures, internal reports and scientific material

title: INTERNSHIP POSITION 2026 : capillary evaporator (Mines Saint-Etienne and ORANO) - 6 months
description:
Joining Mines Saint-√âtienne means committing to an institution where

. It is a school of excellence where everyone has the

The 
Institut Mines-T√©l√©com
 brings together France‚Äôs leading 
Grandes Ecoles
 to tackle major industrial, digital, energy, and environmental challenges. With its eight public 
Grandes √âcoles
 and two affiliated Graduate Schools, it is the leading public institute dedicated to engineers and managers. Together, we imagine and build a sustainable future by educating the leaders who will shape tomorrow‚Äôs transitions.
üéØ¬†Job description
The separation of two compounds is a fundamental process for many industrial sectors. In this project, we focus on evaporators. In a society with increasingly constrained costs and access to energy, reducing the consumption of energy-intensive technologies becomes crucial. The objective of this internship is to evaluate a new evaporator concept inspired by the evapo-transpiration of trees1-4 which makes use of capillary forces to accelerate evaporation rates, thus improving separation and drastically reducing energy costs. Such an evaporator is a complex multi-scale system which involves both thermodynamics of phase changes and capillarity. This experimentally-oriented internship will be based at Mines Saint-Etienne (in collaboration with ORANO) and will allow the student to improve an existing test bench, acquire data and interpret the obtained results. During the internship, many physical parameters such as temperature, pressure, geometry and size of capillaries, can be explored. The student with a solid background in liquid physics and thermodynamics of phase changes will consolidate these areas of expertise during this internship. Depending on the results and on the student's motivation, a PhD thesis involving ORANO could be considered following this internship.
¬†

, 122121.

title: Graduate Program Cloud Engineering
description:
De digitale wereld verandert razendsnel. Organisaties verplaatsen hun systemen naar de cloud om wendbaarder te worden, innovatie te versnellen en betrouwbaarheid te vergroten. Met de opkomst van AI, edge computing, serverless en soevereine cloud technologie√´n ontstaan er bovendien compleet nieuwe mogelijkheden om IT in te zetten naar businesswaarde. Als Itility werken wij al jaren bij een aantal van de meest toonaangevende klanten in Nederland.
Ben jij gepassioneerd over technologie en wil je toekomstbestendige cloudoplossingen bouwen? Heb je sterke analytische vaardigheden en werk je graag in multidisciplinaire teams? Dan is het 
Itility Graduate Program Cloud Engineering
 precies wat je zoekt!
Dit programma is gericht op recent afgestudeerden en junior professionals die hun carri√®re willen starten in de wereld van cloud en automation. In vier intensieve maanden leer je de technische en consultancyvaardigheden die je nodig hebt om als cloud engineer impact te maken bij klanten. Je volgt praktijkgerichte trainingen en werkt in een gesimuleerde klantomgeving om te oefenen met projectmatig werken in een dynamische setting.
Het Graduate Program combineert het beste van twee werelden: 
cloud engineering √©n DevOps
. Je leert onder andere:
Hoe je cloudomgevingen opzet en beheert met 
Azure, AWS of Google Cloud
Hoe je 
Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
 toepast met tools als

containers en Kubernetes
 gebruikt voor schaalbare applicaties

security en monitoring
 integreert in cloudplatforms
Hoe je samenwerkt met developers, architecten en klanten om oplossingen te realiseren
Na vier maanden stroom je door naar een cool klantproject binnen 
Itility
, waar je jouw kennis direct toepast in de praktijk.

title: Graduate Program Data & Generative AI
description:
Digitale transformatie verandert de wereld in rap tempo! Bedrijven willen niet alleen begrijpen wat er is gebeurd, maar ook real-time inzichten verkrijgen √©n voorspellen wat er komen gaat. Met de opkomst van generative AI ontstaan er bovendien volledig nieuwe manieren om data om te zetten in waardevolle oplossingen.
Ben jij gepassioneerd over technologie en wil je digitale oplossingen bouwen met data en AI? Heb je sterke analytische vaardigheden en werk je graag in multidisciplinaire teams? Dan is dit Graduate Program Data & Generative AI misschien wel wat je zoekt!
Het programma is gericht op recent afgestudeerden en junior professionals die tijdens de studie kennis hebben gemaakt met data en AI. In vier maanden leer je de technische en consultancyvaardigheden die je nodig hebt om als engineer impact te maken bij klanten. Je volgt intensieve trainingen en werkt in een gesimuleerde klantomgeving om te oefenen met projectmatig werken in een dynamische setting.
De inhoud combineert het beste van twee werelden: data-engineering √©n generative AI. Je leert onder andere:
Hoe je betrouwbare datapipelines ontwikkelt en grote datastromen verwerkt
Hoe je machine learning toepast voor analyse en voorspelling
Hoe je generative AI inzet, bijvoorbeeld met large language models
Prompt engineering, model-integratie en het bouwen van AI-assistenten
Hoe je inzichten visualiseert in dashboards en bedrijfsregels automatiseert
Na vier maanden stroom je door naar een klantproject, waar je jouw vaardigheden direct toepast in de praktijk.

title: Junior Business Consultant
description:
Heb jij al de eerste stappen in je carri√®re gezet en ben je klaar voor de volgende uitdaging in consultancy? Wil je jouw ervaring inzetten binnen complexe projecten en jezelf verder ontwikkelen tot een topconsultant? Dan is dit het moment om je carri√®re een stevige boost te geven.
Als Junior Business Consultant maak je deel uit van een team dat meetbare resultaten levert voor zowel de Business als IT van onze klanten. Jij bent de verbindende schakel binnen multidisciplinaire projectteams en werkt samen met klanten, IT-architecten, engineers en projectmanagers aan uitdagende vraagstukken.
Je werkt aan projecten bij toonaangevende internationale ondernemingen en innovatieve middelgrote organisaties. Denk aan opdrachten zoals:
Het opzetten van big data-omgevingen
Integratie van complexe applicatielandschappen
Opstellen van business cases voor nieuwe diensten
Inrichten van cloudomgevingen
Jouw rol en groeipad
Afhankelijk van je ervaring en ambities start je in √©√©n of beide van onderstaande rollen. Samen bepalen we tijdens het sollicitatieproces welke route het beste bij je past.
Project Management Officer / Projectleider
Als PMO of beginnend projectleider ben je de rechterhand van een ervaren Project- of Programma Manager. Samen zorg je voor het realiseren van projectdoelen binnen tijd, scope en budget. Je werkt met duidelijke rapportages, bewaakt de voortgang en kwaliteit, ondersteunt besluitvorming in projectboards en zorgt voor overzicht in deliverables, risico‚Äôs en resources. Deze rol is een sterke springplank naar posities als projectmanager of programmamanager.
Business Analist
Als business analist vertaal je klantwensen naar heldere analyses en concrete voorstellen. Je voert gedegen onderzoek uit, stelt de juiste vragen en onderbouwt je adviezen met technische en functionele gegevens, marktinzichten en best practices. Je documenteert bevindingen met hoge kwaliteit. Deze rol is ideaal als je ambieert door te groeien naar business developer of strategisch adviseur.

title: (Junior) Engineer Elektrotechniek
description:
Ben jij een (startend) elektrotechnisch talent met een passie voor complexe technische gebouwen in de onderzoeks-, onderwijs- en cultuursector? Als (Junior) Electrical Engineer binnen de Unit Real Estate krijg je de unieke kans om deel te nemen aan inspirerende en innovatieve projecten die bijdragen aan een duurzame toekomst. Lees verder en ontdek wat deze rol voor jou in petto heeft!
¬†
De uitdaging
¬†
Als Electrical Engineer ben jij onderdeel van de Unit Real Estate. Je werkt aan het elektrotechnisch ontwerp binnen uitdagende projecten in de onderwijs-, onderzoeks- en cultuursector. Hierin kan je complexiteit combineren met maatschappelijke waarde. Je maakt deel uit van multidisciplinaire projectteams en werkt samen met collega‚Äôs van andere disciplines, zoals werktuigbouwkunde, bouwfysica en duurzaamheid. Je krijgt de kans om je te ontwikkelen, zowel inhoudelijk als professioneel, terwijl je praktische oplossingen bedenkt die echt impact maken.
¬†
Tot je verantwoordelijkheden behoren:¬†
Je denkt mee in de conceptfase van projecten.
Je werkt onderdelen van het installatieontwerp uit, zoals energievoorziening, verlichting, zwakstroominstallaties, communicatie- en beveiligingssystemen.
Je maakt veelvoorkomende berekeningen, zoals kabel- en verlichtingsberekeningen.
Je werkt met software zoals Revit (BIM) en DiaLux om ontwerpen te realiseren.
Je ondersteunt in de communicatie naar de klant en het ontwerpteam.
¬†
Het team
¬†
Je komt te werken in een hecht team van jong tot oud. Je kernteam bestaat uit circa 10 collega‚Äôs die goed op elkaar ingespeeld zijn met elk hun eigen achtergrond en expertise. Dit team is onderdeel van de Unit Real Estate met in totaal circa 40 collega‚Äôs. Ons team levert de best passende oplossing voor nieuwbouw, renovatie of transformatievraagstukken, voor overheden, bedrijven en instellingen van nagenoeg iedere schaalgrootte. Geen project is hetzelfde! In de projecten werken wij bij voorkeur veel samen met andere afdelingen binnen Deerns, zoals onze expertisegroepen en buiten de landsgrenzen. Van integrale en complexe opgaven worden wij enthousiast!
Dit ben jij
¬†
Een afgeronde opleiding in HIT-E, elektrotechnisch ontwerpen, energy technology of een aanverwant vakgebied met HBO of WO werk- en denkniveau hebt.
Goede beheersing van de Nederlandse taal (zowel geschreven als gesproken); Engels is een pluspunt.
Met jouw creatieve en praktische kijk op elektrotechniek draag je bij aan slimme en duurzame oplossingen.
Je werkt nauw samen met je collega‚Äôs en bent een teamspeler die goed kan luisteren naar de behoeften van opdrachtgever.
Een positieve, proactieve houding en de ambitie om je te ontwikkelen in het vakgebied
Dit bieden wij
¬†
Een functie van 32-40 uur per week met een bijpassend salaris.¬†
Uitdagende projecten voor toonaangevende opdrachtgevers in Nederland en internationaal.¬†
Een werkomgeving waarin innovatie en duurzaamheid dagelijks in de praktijk worden gebracht.¬†
Aandacht voor jouw eigen ontwikkeling en vitaliteit met ruime opleidings- en ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden, fiets- en sportregelingen, flexibele werkuren, 33 vakantiedagen en mogelijkheid tot aankopen van extra dagen.¬†Samen met je teamleider en coach/ buddy werk je actief aan je ontwikkeling.
Hybride werken, waarbij je de mogelijkheid hebt om afwisselend thuis en op kantoor te werken.¬†
Een team waar samenwerking en collegialiteit voorop staan en waar we informeel met elkaar omgaan.¬†
Duurzaamheid zit in onze genen. Dit uit zich bijvoorbeeld in een mobiliteitsbeleid waar gezondheid en duurzaamheid voorop staan. Veel van onze kantoren liggen bij OV-knooppunten, fietsen wordt aangemoedigd en je reiskosten worden 100% vergoed op basis van OV.¬†
¬†
Over Deerns
¬†
Deerns is als onafhankelijk ingenieursbureau gespecialiseerd in advies, ontwerp en uitvoeringsbegeleiding op het vlak van installatietechniek, bouwfysica, energievoorziening en duurzaamheid. Onze expertises dragen bij aan duurzame, intelligente en toekomstbestendige gebouwen die de processen van onze opdrachtgevers optimaal ondersteunen. We zijn verantwoordelijk voor het ontwerp van de installaties en het realiseren van een goed comfort en een prettig klimaat in de meest uiteenlopende gebouwen; van kantoren, tot luchthavens en van ziekenhuizen tot datacenters.¬†
¬†
Daarnaast is Deerns benoemd als Great Place to Work!
¬†
Kennis maken?
¬†
Wil je meer weten over werken bij Deerns?‚ÄØNeem dan contact op met Maarten Borgmeijer (Corporate Recruiter) via +31 6 11 66 75 44. Wil‚ÄØje meer weten over de inhoud van de functie? Neem dan contact op met Rik Maaijen (Unit Director) van Real Estate via +31 6 10 47 21 16.
¬†
Ben je enthousiast geworden? Reageer met jouw cv via de sollicitatie button. Je‚ÄØontvangt binnen drie werkdagen een reactie. Acquisitie naar aanleiding van de vacatures op onze website wordt niet op prijs gesteld. Cv's en/of voorstellen die ongevraagd aan ons worden gemaild worden niet in behandeling genomen!

title: Assistant Manager - Internship (h/f/x)
description:
Our Group
Joivy is the first comprehensive residential platform in Europe offering a wide range of living spaces to its users: coliving, vacation rentals, student housing, multifamily and coworking. We also support property owners and investors with a complete range of services to enhance their real estate assets: property management, asset management and marketing strategies.
Joivy has 400 employees (average age 32 and over 30 countries of origin), 50 destinations, and 7 countries (Italy, Spain, France, Portugal, UK, Luxembourg and Bulgaria).
Joivy combines the unique experience of DoveVivo, DoveVivo Campus, ALTIDO, Chez-Nestor ¬†and Open with the goal of enthusiastically innovating the European residential market. It also includes the brands Joivy Renew, specialized in home renovation and turnkey furniture sales, and Joivy Invest, a Business Unit focused on real estate investments.
Un √©cosyst√®me innovant pour tous les besoins
Joivy est bien plus qu‚Äôun simple acteur de l‚Äôimmobilier. Nous r√©unissons l‚Äôexpertise de leaders tels que DoveVivo, Altido, Chez Nestor, DoveVivo Campus, Rinnow, et Open pour offrir des solutions adapt√©es √† chaque besoin :

Avec plus de 150 000 utilisateurs accueillis et pr√®s de 2 000 propri√©taires accompagn√©s, Joivy place l‚Äôexcellence et la transparence au centre de ses engagements. Notre approche repose sur une innovation technologique constante : une gestion transparente gr√¢ce √† des outils d‚Äôanalyse performants, une exp√©rience num√©rique fluide facilitant r√©servation et gestion, et des syst√®mes avanc√©s qui allient rigueur, s√©curit√© et intelligence artificielle pour optimiser chaque √©tape.
En r√©sum√©, Joivy c'est :
Une pr√©sence √©tendue
 : Plus de 50 villes dans toute l‚ÄôEurope.
Une expertise unique
 : 450 collaborateurs d√©di√©s, issus de plus de 30 nationalit√©s.

Rejoignez une entreprise en pleine croissance, o√π vous pourrez √©voluer, relever des d√©fis passionnants et contribuer √† fa√ßonner l‚Äôavenir de l‚Äôhabitat en Europe.
Tu es un √©tudiant √† la recherche d‚Äôun stage de 6 mois ?
Que tu sois en premi√®re ou derni√®re ann√©e, JOIVY France¬†t'apportera cette exp√©rience suppl√©mentaire qui fera la diff√©rence pour te pr√©parer √† ta future carri√®re. Chez JOIVY France¬†une multitudes d'opportunit√©s s'ouvrent √† toi √† travers nos diff√©rents p√¥les. Dans chacun d'eux, tu seras form√© et accompagn√©.
Voici une liste des p√¥les que tu pourrais rejoindre :
Business Developer :
 Cette √©quipe est la porte d'entr√©e de notre activit√©. Nous avons besoin de trouver des logements pour notre activit√©. Ton future r√¥le est de trouver les appartements aupr√®s des particuliers ou des professionnels.
Sales :
 Lorsque nous avons des clients qui visitent le site internet pour louer une chambre, notre √©quipe de charg√©s des ventes (B2C) aide et conseille les clients. Ils ont aussi pour r√¥le de mettre en place des promotions ou de faire fluctuer les prix en fonction des saisons. Ton r√¥le sera d'√©changer avec les clients et de participer √† l'√©laboration des strat√©gie de prix et marketing de cette √©quipe.
Customer Care :
 Cette √©quipe est tr√®s importante pour l'exp√©rience client. Ils g√®rent de A √† Z la vie du locataire dans l‚Äôexp√©rience JOIVY, de la signature des √©tats des lieux √† la gestion des cautions, et sont le point de contact principal pour √©changer sur les diff√©rents soucis rencontr√©s. Maintenance¬†:
 Cette √©quipe, elle, travaille sur la maintenance curatives ou pr√©ventives des appartements. C'est l'un des sujets les plus importants pour notre soci√©t√© car c'est ce qui va impacter en positif ou n√©gatif l'exp√©rience client.

description:

title: Internship-Shanghai
description:
About Kuoni Tumlare:
At 
Kuoni Tumlare
, we deliver truly inspiring and innovative solutions and experiences that create value both for our Partners and Society at large. Our wide portfolio of products and solutions is built on 100+ years of destination management experience.
Our solutions include series tours, technical visits, educational tours, Japanspecialist travel consulting, as well as meetings, incentives, conferences, and exhibitions. Our product portfolio includes MyBus excursions at destinations as well as guaranteed departure tours devised and delivered by our Seat-in-Coach specialists, Europamundo (EMV) and MyBus Landcruise.
We cater to a wide range of customer needs in close collaboration with our trusted suppliers and powered by our team of destinations experts - enabling us to make a real difference to the world.
About the Business:
Our Destination Management services form the core of our business. We take care of everything from ground support, hotel bookings, sightseeing, restaurants, and local guides; all while providing 24/7 customer support so that travelers from over 50 countries can enjoy memorable travel experiences worry free.
Responsibilities:
New group bookings, including series and ad hoc
Push confirmation of services, including hotels and ground services
Deadline control
Revenue/budget control. Gate keeper to decline go ahead under targeted financial margin % to sales unless written approval by Market Leader.
Regular update of sign up pax
Communicate with agents, LPICs and HRD people whenever it needs
Cancel groups when required and follow up cancellation fee if any
Materialize groups when approved by agents and make sure all services to be confirmed properly by due time
Change services and follow up confirmation by due time
Finalize groups and send out final document to agents
Check BIS reports and create invoices before/on departure.
Solve account query no later than 30days. If over 30days, need to bring up to manager right away.
Trouble shooting while groups are on tour.
Join weekly operation team meeting for information sharing and case study.
Complete assignment and reports to supervisor/operation manager

title: Junior Accountant AR  (maternity cover 1 year contract)
description:
At 
Kuoni Tumlare
, we deliver truly inspiring and innovative solutions and experiences that create value both for our Partners and Society at large. Our wide portfolio of products and solutions is built on 100+ years of destination management experience.
Our solutions include series tours, technical visits, educational tours, Japanspecialist travel consulting, as well as meetings, incentives, conferences, and exhibitions. Our product portfolio includes MyBus excursions at destinations as well as guaranteed departure tours devised and delivered by our Seat-in-Coach specialists, Europamundo (EMV) and MyBus Landcruise.
We cater to a wide range of customer needs in close collaboration with our trusted suppliers and powered by our team of destinations experts - enabling us to make a real difference to the world.
Our global Finance function acts as a driver of integration across our businesses, operating across four central principles: global Finance functions provide subject matter expertise; local finance ensure operational execution according to local requirements; global process owners for are in charge of standardization & optimization; and the St. Petersburg Finance hub performs transactional finance activities.
As
 Accountant¬†AR
 you proactively collaborate with other departments, local accounting offices, the Finance hub in St. Petersburg, business stakeholders and external agents on all company receivable and credit control issues. You support timely and accurate process delivery, diagnosing issues, cascading them to responsible departments and implementing solutions to increase process efficiency.
Furthermore, you help monitoring the accounts receivables and related AX accounts to make sure that the open balances are existing and valid.
In this role you report to the Head of Finance & Accounting (Switzerland) and coordinate closely with other local AR offices around the world as well as stakeholders within own business area of responsibility.

title: Junior Financieel Medewerker
description:
Financieel Medewerker
Ben jij nauwkeurig, leergierig en klaar voor een internationale stap in je carri√®re? Het Financial Shared Service Center (FSSC) van Bike Mobility Services Group (BMS) breidt uit. Wij zoeken een gedreven
Financieel Medewerker (0,8-1,0 FTE)
die ons team komt ondersteunen bij het beheer van onze groeiende markten in Duitsland en Zweden.
Wat ga je doen?
Als Financieel Medewerker ondersteun je de verantwoordelijke financials bij de administratie van BusinessBike Germany en BMS Zweden. Je bent een onmisbare schakel in de dagelijkse operatie van het Finance Operations team.
Je werkzaamheden bestaan uit het controleren en verwerken van inkoop- en verkoopfacturen, het klaarzetten van betalingen en het ondersteunen bij de periodieke afsluitingen. Het is een dynamische rol waarin je veel leert over internationale geldstromen. Je werkt nauw samen met ervaren collega‚Äôs Amersfoort, waarbij je de ruimte krijgt om stap voor stap meer verantwoordelijkheid te nemen en mee te denken over hoe we onze processen slimmer kunnen inrichten.

title: Finance & Administration Internship in the Lomography Headquarter
description:
Lomography is a globally active organization dedicated to experimental and creative analogue photography. Originally established in 1992 by a group of offbeat students as an art movement, but fuelled by fiery passion and burning curiosity, the Lomographic Society soon grew to become the creative and innovative international company it is today.
We develop, market and distribute our products via worldwide photo stores, design stores, museums and lifestyle stores, as well as via our Lomography websites available in 17 languages which besides the online shop also host photo magazines and platforms for an international community of over one million Lomographers. Lomography regularly hosts events and exhibitions. The Lomography headquarters is in Vienna and has subsidiaries in London, Paris, NY, Tokyo, HK, Shanghai and Manila.
For our headquarters in Vienna we are offering an internship in Finance & Administration. In this very interesting role, you will be part of our dynamic international Finance and Administration team and get the chance to gain practical knowledge and valuable experience from your colleagues in controlling, accounting, logistics, IT and other departments.
Are you currently in your education and motivated to add valuable practical experience to your theoretical knowledge in a dynamic F&A team? If you're also interested in photography and a creative lifestyle, then now it‚Äôs a great opportunity for you to apply for an internship with us!
Learning Objectives and Tasks
Developing an understanding of how ERP and reporting systems function
Maintaining master data in IT systems (customers, prices, orders, etc.)
Learning operational routines in ERP systems
Participating in the creation and evaluation of reports, processing ad-hoc analyses and target/actual comparisons
Working with large datasets and "big data" for analysis
Recognizing and understanding business relationships within the company
Cost analyses and research on cost-related issues
Accounting tasks (accounts payable, accounts receivable, and bank accounting; account and balance reconciliation)

title: Junior / Regional Finance & Administration Manager for Asia Pacific
description:
About the company and the job:
Lomography is a globally active organization dedicated to experimental and creative analogue photography. Originally established in 1992 by a group of offbeat students as an arts movement, but fuelled by fiery passion and burning curiosity, the Lomographic Society soon grew to become the creative and innovative international company it is today.
We develop, market and distribute our products via worldwide photo stores, design stores, museums and lifestyle stores, as well as via our Lomography websites available in 17 languages which besides the online shop also host photo magazines and platforms for an international community of over one million ‚ÄúLomographers‚Äù. Lomography regularly hosts events and exhibitions. The Lomography headquarters is in Vienna and has subsidiaries in London, Paris, NY, Tokyo, HK, Shanghai and Manila.
For our subsidiary in Hong Kong, we are looking for a Regional Finance & Administration Manager for Asia. In this very interesting role, you will be a key part of a dynamic international Finance and Administration team and work closely with all other departments such as sales and logistics. You will be in close contact with the Lomography Headquarter in Vienna/Austria and various other subsidiaries all over the world to support the operations of the company with various topics related to Accounting, Finance and Administration.
Company Website: 
http://www.lomography.com
Employment Type: Full-time (5 days work)
Job Description/Responsibilities:
Take responsibility for accounting, general ledger, accounts receivable, accounts payable for our subsidiaries in Hong Kong, China, Japan, Philippines
Coordinate the preparation of financial statements in collaboration with local staff and CPAs
Setup accounting procedures for new subsidiaries
Support procedures to ensure compliance with local regulations and company standards
Lead local F&A teams in HK and in Asian subsidiaries and maintain regular communication to provide updates and guidance
Get involved in administrational topics related to the subsidiaries in Asia in coordination with local F&A staff and CPAs
Collaboration in the preparation and analysis of various financial reports such as sales reports, expenses analysis reports and other key metrics.
Analyse expenses and set up basic cost control and profitability checks
Assist and supervise regional finance controlling activities in Asia with the goal to derive recommendations relevant for decision-making
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to streamline processes, improve efficiency, and enhance financial performance
Support international tax planning and compliance across jurisdictions in collaboration with tax advisers
Oversee payroll and personnel expenses for the Asia region
Manage cash and payments and provide weekly cash flow reports and forecasts
Identify ways to improve the day-to-day processes, and provide suggestions on efficiency and effectiveness enhancements
Perform other ad-hoc duties as required
Support smooth office routines for the regional team in Asia

title: Junior Wholesale Manager/Business Developer ‚Äì APAC
description:
We welcome applicants who are at the beginning of their career or recently graduated for this position.
We are looking for a Junior Wholesale Manager/Business Developer to operate and develop the Lomography business in Asia Pacific. To succeed in this role, you need to be a persuasive person with a driving force for closing deals, developing new sales channels, building relationships, identifying market trends, developing and executing strategies, accordingly, counterbalanced by your mad love for analogue photography and creativity!
ABOUT LOMOGRAPHY
At Lomography, we‚Äôre not just another company ‚Äì we‚Äôre a globally active organization dedicated to experimental and creative analogue photography. What started as an art movement by a group of offbeat students in 1992 has evolved into an international company fuelled by passion and curiosity. We develop, market, and distribute our products worldwide, reaching millions of photography enthusiasts through our photo stores, design stores, museums, online platforms, and events.
ABOUT THE JOB
As a Business Developer, you will be responsible for identifying and pursuing new business opportunities for Lomography in APAC (specific markets to be assigned based on the candidate‚Äôs background, experience and skillsets). To succeed in this role, you need to be a persuasive person with a driving force for closing deals, developing new sales channels, building relationships, identifying market trends, developing and executing strategies accordingly, counterbalanced by your mad love for analogue photography and creativity!
You will have the opportunity to connect with a global community of millions of photography enthusiasts, artists, and creatives. As part of our young, dynamic and international team, you will have excellent professional and personal development opportunities. You will have the opportunity to navigate and experience the exciting and rapidly evolving business environment of Asia!
RESPONSIBILITIES
Research and identify new growth opportunities for Lomography's wholesale and retail business in the Asia Pacific markets including business partnership with chain stores, concept stores, independent retailers, distributors.
Proactively research and identify new potential wholesale accounts, build a pipeline of new leads and be the first point of contact.
Drive the entire sales cycle from prospecting and initial contact to negotiation, closing deals, and contract.
Follow up and optimise sell-through, and ensure excellent product presentation in retails.
Manage existing and new accounts and ensure productive partnerships and sales growth with our customers.
Research and develop projects of customised Lomography products with brand and cooperate partners.
Collaborate with our marketing team and create marketing support and collaboration with our customers.
Proactively provide regular updates, market research, analysis, reports on sales activities, clients' status and progress toward sales targets to the management team.

description:

title: Sales & Marketing Internship CEE Market
description:
ABOUT US
Lomography is a globally active organization dedicated to experimental and creative analogue photography. Originally established in 1992 by a group of offbeat students as an arts movement, but fuelled by fiery passion and burning curiosity, the Lomographic Society soon grew into an international venture.
Our snapshots are characterized by vibrant colours, surprise effects and pure spontaneity. We have over a million creative members across the world and invite you to let loose, ignite your inspiration and to catapult your shots around the globe through our online platform. Whether you‚Äôre a complete novice or a seasoned pro, everyone can harness the photographic power to create something incredible. Don‚Äôt think ‚Äì just shoot!
RESPONSIBILITIES
Research and contact potential retail partners from the cultural, lifestyle, design,¬†photography, fashion, music industries throughout Central & Eastern Europe (with a focus on Poland, Romania, Czec Republic).
Research on potential distribution and B2B incentive¬†opportunities in Central & Eastern Europe
Work closely with the sales, logistics and finance teams to process B2B orders
Assist the sales¬†team in creating sales, marketing and training materials for retail customers
Support the execution of sales & marketing campaigns and strategies worldwide
Update international marketing and sales materials for internal use
Reaching out to press contacts and managing the press database in Central & Eastern Europe
Writing and publishing features on the Lomography online magazine
Help to coordinate the Lomography Community in Central & Eastern Europe

title: Junior or Mid-Senior BANKING IT CONSULTANT
description:
In order to reinforce their consultant teams, MAINSYS is looking for a junior/mid senior banking IT consultant who will:
You will ...
think out a conceptual & functional analysis that brings the client‚Äôs requirements in line with the end user‚Äôs needs
take part in the technical analysis and development phase
integrate the various software components in the Client‚Äôs IT environment
participate in technical projects (COBOL, JAVA, SQL,‚Ä¶)
be part of a Mainsys team working in closed collaboration
We coach our banking IT consultants in the context of the projects and aiming at developing the required skills, both in IT and around the banking applications and business.
Your Profile
You are an Engineer (must have)
You have interest in IT projects.
You are proficient in English.
Knowledge of JAVA and SQL is mandatory
Knowledge of other programming languages is an asset
You have between 0 to 5 years‚Äô experience in a similar function
Our offer

A competitive salary combined with extra-legal benefits, including a mobility budget with the option to choose between a company car and/or reimbursement for sustainable transport, and even, under certain conditions, reimbursement of your mortgage or rent.
Access to our training platform
Enjoy access to the Benefits@Work platform and its exclusive offers.
A desk in a nice office and of course your own workplace @home according to the client's policy

title: Junior Operations Manager
description:
Welkom in de nieuwe praktijk
Nog niet zo lang geleden liep er een man ons kantoor binnen met een gitaar onder zijn arm. Hij had een lied geschreven voor Manometric. Voor het eerst in drie jaar kon hij weer spelen. Dankzij een kleine, perfect passende handbrace.
Dat is wat wij bouwen. Bij Manometric ontwerpen en produceren we op maat gemaakte ortheses met eigen 3D-scantechnologie, slimme software en schaalbare productie. We werken direct samen met ziekenhuizen en klinieken in heel Nederland en breiden uit naar Duitsland.
Naarmate we snel groeien, wordt onze operatie ook complexer: planning, productie, logistiek en klinische samenwerking moeten functioneren als √©√©n geheel. Daarom zoeken we een Junior Operations Manager. Iemand die energie krijgt van structuur aanbrengen, overzicht cre√´ren en processen stap voor stap verbeteren.
De rol die jij speelt bij onze groei
Als Junior Operations Manager ben je een centrale schakel in het dagelijks functioneren van onze orthopedische teams. Jij zorgt ervoor dat planningen kloppen, processen soepel lopen en data inzicht geeft in waar we kunnen verbeteren. Je werkt nauw samen met orthopedisch technologen, operations en cli√´ntcontact teams. Door jouw overzicht en initiatief kunnen collega‚Äôs hun werk beter doen en krijgen pati√´nten sneller de juiste zorg. Jij bent verantwoordelijk voor:
Planning en operationele co√∂rdinatie
Jij neemt ownership over de planning en het organiseren van de inzet van onze orthopedisch technologen. Je bewaakt capaciteit, lost knelpunten op en zorgt dat afspraken effici√´nt worden ingepland.
Proces en data verbetering
Je analyseert data, bouwt dashboards en vertaalt inzichten naar concrete verbeteringen. Je neemt eigenaarschap over operationele KPI‚Äôs en helpt processen slimmer en schaalbaarder te maken.
Dit ga je doen
Maakt planningen voor orthopedisch technologen en optimaliseert capaciteit
Co√∂rdineert afspraken, orders en verwijzingen
Bouwt dashboards en monitort KPI‚Äôs
Analyseert waar processen beter kunnen en initieert verbeteringen
Ondersteunt operations bij projecten en procesoptimalisatie
Schakelt met interne teams om knelpunten snel op te lossen
Zorgt voor overzicht en structuur in een snelgroeiende omgeving

title: Internship Design Engineering
description:
Welcome to the new reality of care
At Manometric, we‚Äôre transforming orthoses and prosthetics from medical necessities into products people actually want to wear. That requires smart technology and thoughtful design. From our proprietary 3D scanners to radically new brace concepts - everything starts with a strong idea - and an even better execution.
How you create meaningful change in healthcare
As an intern within Manomeric you‚Äôll be part of the team developing our orthosis and scanner portfolio. Together with engineers, software developers and external partners, you‚Äôll work on products that directly impact people‚Äôs lives. You‚Äôll have access to cutting-edge 3D technology and the freedom to rapidly prototype, test, and bring ideas into production.
You have a broad skillset from concept development to engineering and production. You are hands-on: you are not afraid to get your hands dirty and know your way around the workshop. You‚Äôll work closely with experienced industrial designers and you will have the opportunity to learn from them on all levels of product development.
Ready for an internship where you have the opportunity to both develop yourself and make a real impact on peoples lives? We look forward to meeting you.
What you‚Äôll be doing
Design (parts of) medical products from start to finish: from initial idea to production-ready in close collaboration with senior members of the team.
Think conceptually, prototype, test, and improve based on user insights.
Take ownership of projects, making a real impact on peoples lives.
Collaborate with our internal healthcare team and get in contact with our patients to test your assumptions quickly.¬†
Work with and develop your skills with tools such as Rhino, Fusion360, Figma, Adobe and Keyshot or equivalent.

title: Junior Lead Generation Specialist
description:
Marcus Evans
, founded in 1983, is a global leader in business intelligence. Our Private Wealth Management (PWM) Summit is one of our flagship global brands - an exclusive, invitation-only forum where private investors (Single and Multi-Family Offices) meet to stress-test investment mandates.
We are seeking finance-minded graduates to join our Private Markets Strategic Partnerships team. This is a high-impact, junior role designed for those looking to build a career at the intersection of Finance and Strategic Marketing. You will not be "selling"; instead, you will be the engine of our market intelligence, identifying and profiling the specific Family Office executives and CIOs who define the private markets.
This is a junior position, fresh graduates are encouraged to apply.
This is an in-person role located in our 
Nicosia
 office, working hours 10:00 AM ‚Äì 6:30 PM (US Market Alignment).
Key Responsibilities
Family Office Profiling: Conduct deep-dive research into the North American private wealth landscape to identify Principals and CIOs at Single and Multi-Family Offices (SFO/MFO).
Investment Mandate Mapping: Analyze summit themes (e.g., Private Equity, Venture Capital, Real Estate, and Digital Assets) to identify the institutional investors actively looking for these allocations.
Hyper-Personalized Outreach: Design and execute sophisticated, data-driven outreach campaigns (Direct Mail & Email) that speak the language of C-suite investment professionals.
Lead Generation Strategy: Work directly with the North American Delegate Sales team to build high-prestige prospect pipelines, ensuring our summits maintain their "elite-only" status.
CRM Intelligence: Master HubSpot and LinkedIn Sales Navigator to map the complex networks of the ultra-high-net-worth (UHNW) community.
Qualifications
Educational Background: A recognized degree in Finance, Economics, Investments, or a related analytical field is highly preferred.
Market Curiosity: A genuine interest in the Private Markets, Private Equity, and how Family Offices manage wealth across generations.
Analytical Rigor: Excellent research abilities with the ability to "connect the dots" between an investment trend and the executive managing it.
Communication: Native-level or excellent English language skills with the ability to draft professional, high-level business correspondence.
Performance Driven: A desire to work in a fast-paced environment where your research directly impacts the success of a multi-million dollar event brand.
Compensation & Benefits
Foundational Finance Training: Gain a "Masterclass" understanding of the US Private Wealth market‚Äîknowledge that is highly transferable to Investment Banking, PE, or Wealth Management roles.
Professional Mentoring: Continuous on-the-job training and a clear career path into Senior Strategic Partnerships or Delegate Sales.
Global Networking: Build an understanding of the decision-making process of Fortune 1000 and UHNW executives.
Compensation: Attractive basic salary and a commission package tied to the success of your outreach campaigns.
We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.
¬†#LI-Onsite

title: Junior Sales Executive (Entry Level) ‚Äì Summits APAC
description:
Marcus Evans
, founded in 1983, is a global business intelligence and event marketing company, with 49 offices in 20+ countries. Headquartered in the UK, we are rated in the top 20 UK companies for work/life balance.
We‚Äôre looking for a motivated and enthusiastic individual with a passion for sales and a desire to grow in a fast-paced, supportive environment to join our APAC Summits business unit as a Junior Sales Executive.
Through in-person Summits, we curate matches between buyers and sellers via guaranteed, pre-qualified, mutually agreed one-to-one meetings. We work with world leaders in a variety of industries, including healthcare, legal, pharmaceutical, investments, energy, and packaging. Our client base is comprised of C-level executives from 98% of existing fortune 1000 companies.
As a 
Junior Sales Executive
, you will be responsible for identifying top solution providers in the industry and matching them with the right clients. You‚Äôll engage with senior-level executives, learn about their growth goals, and turn that insight into valuable business opportunities.
This role is ideal if you want to start your career in B2B International Sales. A successful candidate will develop into a Senior Account Executive after achieving initial milestones. We recognize excellence and are fully committed to developing impactful¬†future leaders.
This is an
 in-person role
 located in our 
Mumbai office
.
Key Responsibilities
Engage with C-Level audiences, generating leads and prospecting over the phone.
Prepare and deliver compelling sales pitching and proposals.
Negotiate contracts and close sales to achieve or exceed monthly and quarterly targets.
Create and execute strategic sales campaigns.
Nurturing new and existing client relationships.
Qualifications 
Bachelor's degree.
Recent graduate or up to 1 year of professional experience.
Excellent English communication skills (verbal and written).
Strong interest in sales and a good acumen for commercial thinking.
Confident, outgoing, and resilient personality.
Self-motivated and goal-oriented mindset.
Active listening and problem-solving skills.
Eagerness to learn and grow professionally.
Good time management and organizational abilities.
Team player with a collaborative spirit.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word); familiarity with CRM is a plus.
¬†
Compensation & Benefits
Enjoy a guaranteed base salary plus a commission structure.
Income progression within 1 to 2 years as you move and develop to the next level in your sales career ladder.
We offer rapid career progression based on clear targets and a well-defined career path.
Benefit from a structured training plan and coaching sessions with our experienced and strong leadership team.
As our valued employees you shall gain access to continuous learning via our multi training programs and platforms to upskill your Sales competencies with our comprehensive online database training features.
HubSpot CRM to manage relationships, prospect data, and pipelines.
Our organization aims to connect, inform, and inspire people.
We are proud to be rated among the top 20 UK companies for work/life balance.
We foster a high-spirited, teamwork-oriented environment.
Our convenient strategic location is excellent and close to public transport.
Travelling to amazing locations at 5-Star Hotels to build your network at our exclusive Summit events.
We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.
#LI-Onsite

title: Junior Regional Sales Executive
description:
Marcus Evans
, founded in 1983, is a global business intelligence and event marketing company, with 49 offices in 20+ countries. Headquartered in the UK, we are rated in the top 20 UK companies for work/life balance.
Working across all industry sectors our Summits, Conferences and Online Events brands deliver innovative high-level content, networking and one-to-one meeting platforms that bring together key decision-makers on a truly global scale. Our client base is comprised of c-level executives from 98% of existing fortune 1000 companies, and are world leaders in a variety of industries, such as healthcare, legal, pharmaceutical, investments, energy, packaging etc.
We are looking for an ambitious Junior Regional Sales Executive to help drive new business. In this unique position, you will work closely with a Sales Mentor who will guide your growth and help you achieve your financial and professional goals. This role is ideal if you want to start your career in business development as success will be rewarded with a career growth.
This is an in - person role located in 
Penang 
office.
Key Responsibilities
Lead prospecting.
Creating, modifying, and launching strategic email campaigns.
Assisting your sales mentor with day- to-day sales functions.
Auditing existing client relationships for further opportunities.
Setting monthly goals and KPIs.
Bringing your own set of ideas to help improve day-to-day operations and drive results.
Qualifications
Excellent written and oral skills (English).
Basic understanding of sales principles.
Track record of over-achieving goals.
Solid communication and interpersonal skills.
Customer service focus.
Thrives in a fast-paced environment.
Not being afraid to fail means being bold and improving.
Compensation & Benefits
Competitive base salary (RM3000) and commission structure.
Uncapped commission potential.
A friendly, dynamic, and vibrant working environment.
Fast career plans within the same division or across division based on performance and results.
Continuous training plans, coaching and mentorship programs.
Travelling to 5-Star hotels to support exclusive events and client meetings.
Team building activities in a multicultural, diverse, social, and fast paced environment.
Medical coverage.
We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.

Marcus Evans
, founded in 1983, is a global business intelligence and event marketing company, with 49 offices in 20+ countries. Headquartered in the UK, we are rated in the top 20 UK companies for work/life balance.
Working across all industry sectors our Summits, Conferences and Online Events brands deliver innovative high-level content, networking and one-to-one meeting platforms that bring together key decision-makers on a truly global scale. Our client base is comprised of c-level executives from 98% of existing fortune 1000 companies, and are world leaders in a variety of industries, such as healthcare, legal, pharmaceutical, investments, energy, packaging etc.
We are looking for driven, enthusiastic, and passionate professionals to join our Summits division and Sales team as Marketing Researcher. In this role you will be working with key industry leaders and innovators. We help companies better their business through corporate meetings with targeted customers at very elite and specialized B2B events. This role is perfect for those looking to start their career in sales and business development. While sales experience is always great, it‚Äôs not necessary.

Kuala Lumpur
 office.
Key Responsibilities
You will develop a fundamental understanding of each event.
Analyze and identify target client contacts based on event topic and geographic markets.
Grow, develop and improve client contact information by conducting internet and telephone research.
Build and maintain the data quality of our contacts database.
Plan, implement and monitor marketing campaigns to generate marketing referrals for sponsorship sales and direct marketing.

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Willingness to adapt to a performance driven culture.

Able to start immediately.

Competitive salary package.
Incentive scheme and a supportive, professional work environment.
Comprehensive induction training, ongoing mentoring, plus continuous on-the-job training and development.
Promotion up the ranks is achievable with consistent high performance.
5-day working week full-time position.

title: International Sales Executive ‚Äì EU Market, Junior Level
description:
Marcus Evans
, founded in 1983, is a global business intelligence and event marketing company, with 49 offices in 20+ countries. Headquartered in the UK, we are rated in the top 20 UK companies for work/life balance.
Working across all industry sectors our Summits, Conferences and Online Events brands deliver innovative high-level content, networking and one-to-one meeting platforms that bring together key decision-makers on a truly global scale. Our client base is comprised of c-level executives from 98% of existing fortune 1000 companies, and are world leaders in a variety of industries, such as healthcare, legal, pharmaceutical, investments, energy, packaging etc.
We are looking for driven, enthusiastic and passionate professionals to join our Conference division and excel in B2B event sales in the US, EU and Middle East market. We are looking to grow our team in Karachi, providing successful candidates with the opportunity for exceptional career growth and unlimited earnings. A strong grasp of and ability to operate fluently in an English-speaking environment is essential to be successful in the role.
¬†
This is an on-site role in our¬†
Karachi¬†
office. Working hours will follow UK market,

. ¬†

junior¬†role

Sell access to our conferences in the EU market to senior decision makers from MNCs through cold calling, email and social media.

title: Junior Sales Executive (Middle East & APAC Market)
description:
Marcus Evans
, founded in 1983, is a global business intelligence and event marketing company, with 49 offices in 20+ countries. Headquartered in the UK, we are rated in the top 20 UK companies for work/life balance.
We are looking for an ambitious Junior Sales Executive
 
in driving and acquiring new business delegates for our EMEA & APAC Conferences business unit.¬†
Leveraging a truly global portfolio of over 300 annual events showcase the real-world strategies and solutions our clients are implementing within their businesses right now to overcome some of today‚Äôs most pressing business challenges across all sectors. Our high-level delegates are innovative and forward thinking; seeking collaboration and solutions to improve their businesses.
This role is ideal if you want to start your career in business sales. A successful candidate will develop into Senior Level after achieving initial milestones. We recognize excellence and are fully committed to developing impactful future leaders.
This is an in-person role located in our 
Islamabad 
office.
Key Responsibilities
Engage with corporate audiences, generating leads and prospecting over the phone.
Prepare and deliver compelling sales pitching and proposals.
Negotiate contracts and close sales to achieve or exceed monthly and quarterly targets.
Create and execute strategic sales campaigns.
Nurturing new and existing client relationships.
Qualifications
Sales experience: 1-2 years of proven B2B or B2C sales experience, preferably with a high-priced product. Fresh graduates with high interest in sales are highly encouraged to apply.
Experience in creating and launching strategic marketing email campaigns is a plus.
Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite.
Proven track record of exceeding goals.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Thrives in a fast-paced environment.
Compensation & Benefits
Remuneration & Career Development
Enjoy a base salary plus a commission structure between 1,467,000 PKR to 3,300,000 PKR per year.
Income progression within 1 to 2 years as you move and develop to the next level in your sales career ladder.
We offer rapid career progression based on clear targets and a well-defined career path.
Future professional development may lead to opportunities for temporary or permanent transfers to other Marcus Evans locations, including London, Barcelona, Amsterdam, Kuala Lumpur, Tokyo, Sydney, Toronto, New York, Chicago, Miami, Los Angeles, and more.
Training, & Sales Platforms
Benefit from a structured training plan and coaching sessions with our experienced and strong leadership team.
As our valued employees you shall gain access to continuous learning via our multi training programs and platforms AOT, MIT and LMS to upskill your Sales competencies with our comprehensive online database training features.
A formed Accounts Development Executive team that shall be collaborating closely with you in bringing in new quality sales prospects
HubSpot CRM
 to manage relationships, prospect data, and pipelines.
Culture
Our organization aims to connect, inform, and inspire people.
You will receive training and mentorship from Directors and Managers with exceptional strategic sales experience.
We foster a high-spirited, teamwork-oriented environment.
Travel
Travelling to amazing locations at 5-Star Hotels to build your network at our exclusive Conference events.
We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.
#LI-Onsite

title: Junior Sales Executive ‚Äì Conferences, APAC
description:
Marcus Evans
, founded in 1983, is a global business intelligence and event marketing company, with 49 offices in 20+ countries. Headquartered in the UK, we are rated in the top 20 UK companies for work/life balance.¬†
Working across all industry sectors our Summits, Conferences and Online Events brands deliver innovative high-level content, networking and one-to-one meeting platforms that bring together key decision-makers on a truly global scale. Our client base is comprised of c-level executives from 98% of existing fortune 1000 companies, and are world leaders in a variety of industries, such as healthcare, legal, pharmaceutical, investments, energy, packaging etc.
We are looking for driven, enthusiastic, and passionate professionals to join our Sales team as  Junior Sales Executives for our conferences division. In this role you will be working with key industry leaders and innovators. We help companies better their business through corporate meetings with targeted customers at very elite and specialized B2B events. This role is perfect for those looking to start their career in sales and business development. While sales experience is always great, it‚Äôs not necessary.
This is an in-person role located in our 
Mumbai 
office.
Key Responsibilities
Market research and data capture.
Cold calling and prospecting over the phone.
Showing up with a positive attitude ready to crush your goals.
Sales outreach leveraging the phone, email, and voicemail.
Developing and managing your own portfolio of clients.
Set monthly goals and KPIs.
Basic understanding of sales principles.
Commercial acumen & flair for sales.
Qualifications
Candidates must possess at least a Bachelor Degree in Business Studies/Administration/ Management or equivalent to be considered for this position.
Positive mindset and excellent communication skills in English, high level of self motivation and tremendous work ethic, attention to details, strong negotiation skills, ambitious and an unquenchable desire for success.
Work experience in the related field is welcomed but not required as our New Hire Training Program is sufficient to get you started on a successful path.
Only Full-Time position(s) available.
We need energetic team members who can facilitate interactions between executives (Buyers) and our service providers.
This is an inside sales job, comfort with cold-calling is essential.
Bringing your own set of ideas to help improve day-to-day operations and results.
Strategic thinking & research abilities.
A proven track record of accomplishing ambitious goals, be it in your professional career or personal life. We want to hear all about your big wins.
Compensation & Benefits
Competitive Base Salary and an Uncapped Commission Plan.
We provide the very best world class, on-going B2B inside sales training and development.
Fast-Track and transparent promotional structure based on performance.
Transfer opportunities to other offices globally depending on performance.
Opportunity to attend our events globally.
Additional incentives, including all-expense paid trips to Singapore, Australia, Europe, regular team outings.
We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.

title: Intern - People Operations Partner
description:
HEY THERE! 
We are 
Mercedes-Benz.io
. Our mission is to ignite and build the digital solutions for Mercedes-Benz by forming a tribe of digital enthusiasts that drive Mercedes-Benz digital future.
We don‚Äôt care about your shoes, as long as you are wearing the right attitude. At 
Mercedes-Benz.io
 we walk the talk and make things happen. We do not digitize for the sake of being digital but for a better tomorrow for our customers. That‚Äôs not our job; it‚Äôs our passion. Therefore, we love to reflect and challenge everything ‚Äì the status quo, Mercedes-Benz, and ourselves. We share the same beliefs and stand up for each other and this is why we hire unique people to join our Tribe of digital enthusiasts. 
IN THIS ROLE YOU WILL
Support employee inquiries on People Operations-related topics
Assist in maintaining physical and digital personnel records, ensuring compliance with data protection regulations
Help with administrative aspects of the onboarding and offboarding processes
Learn to update HR databases and systems (e.g., Personio, ZEP);
Draft recommendation letters, job reference letters, and other employment attestations under guidance
Assist in preparing employment contracts and related documentation
Support Time & Attendance activities
 Support Travel Management activities
Contribute to reports and presentations related to People Analytics for internal communications
Gain knowledge of national labor law and compliance guidelines
Support internal processes related to relocation, work permits, and residence permits for international employees
Assist in monthly payroll preparation and coordination with the external payroll provider
Participate in projects focused on process optimization and company culture

title: Junior Customer Success Manager
description:
The role
We are now seeking a highly motivated 
Junior Customer Success Manager 
to join us in Milan. You will operate at the intersection of customer success and early-stage sales activities. The role involves supporting customer adoption while proactively engaging potential new customers through outbound initiatives.
Responsibilities:
Support customer onboarding and adoption in complex, technical environments, working alongside Solution Architects and Engineers.
Act as a first point of contact for customers on product usage, basic technical questions, and best practices.
Monitor customer usage, engagement, and health metrics to proactively identify risks and opportunities.
Conduct outreach activities (via structured sequences with emails, cold calls, linkedin messages) to engage potential new customers and support pipeline generation.
Qualify inbound and outbound leads, understanding customer needs and technical context.
Participate in discovery calls and demo sessions.
Align the BU manager and the Sales manager in periodic pipeline check-ins.
Ensure a smooth handover between Sales, Pre-Sales, and Customer Success phases.
Collect and share customer feedback with Product and Engineering teams to drive continuous improvement.
Maintain accurate customer and prospect information in the CRM system.
Support reporting on customer success and commercial metrics (e.g. adoption, satisfaction, retention, early pipeline indicators).

title: Data Operations - Internship
description:
Join one of the hottest Barcelona-based high-growth startups!
Pioneer in AI-powered B2B Marketing and B2B Social Media
Young and multinational team with fun and driven team spirit
100% remote flexibility AND terrace-office in the heart of Barcelona
Macbooks, language courses, company events, etc
Experienced founders with high-growth track record
800‚Ç¨ internship compensation per month
ABOUT MOMENTUM DATA:
At Momentum Data we are rethinking the way enterprise B2B marketing teams operate. Our unique technology leverages Artificial Intelligence, Robotic Process Automation and B2B Social Media, and combines the technologies in an original and disruptive way. Originally founded in London, and serving the world‚Äôs largest enterprises globally. We are a group of young and driven professionals from all corners of this world, who have come together in our main Barcelona offices with the clear idea to leave a mark in the rapidly growing and fascinating marketing technology space. We are a stable and profitable high-growth operation, and our journey has just begun.
ABOUT THIS ROLE:
During this 6-month internship - ideally taking place in the final 6 months before your graduation and potentially leading to a full-time position afterwards - you will become an integral part of our operations team. This team is responsible for executing B2B marketing programs for clients across various industries, including software, IT, professional services, manufacturing, electronics, and others.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: 
Conduct analytical tasks with a strong emphasis on using our software and marketing automation tools
Define and gather target audiences for B2B marketing programs
Support the technical setup and execution of marketing programs
Manage and execute tasks using specialised software tools
Perform comprehensive reporting and data analysis to measure program performance
Collect and evaluate data to optimize ongoing marketing strategies
Support sales, marketing, and account management teams in new customer acquisition initiatives

We combineren doorgedreven financi√´le kennis met een warme, pragmatische en lokaal verankerde aanpak. Onze consultants werken 
dicht bij de klant
, in de systemen van het bestuur zelf, en worden gewaardeerd om hun betrokkenheid, betrouwbaarheid en oplossingsgerichte mindset.¬†
Kortom, Moore Public is d√© partner voor lokale overheden die op zoek zijn naar financi√´le expertise, beleidskundige ondersteuning en betrouwbare consultants.¬†
Door sterke groei breiden we ons team verder uit. Daarom zoeken we een gedreven Consultant.¬†
Word jij onze nieuwe companion?
¬†
Als Financial Consultant ondersteun je lokale besturen bij uiteenlopende financi√´le en organisatorische uitdagingen. Je werkt daarbij 
op locatie
 in de provincie Limburg, rechtstreeks in de omgeving van de klant, en maakt √©cht impact.¬†
Je begeleidt lokale besturen bij boekhouding, rapportering, jaarafsluiting en budgetopmaak.¬†¬†
Je werkt zowel analytisch als operationeel, afhankelijk van de noden.¬†¬†
Je ondersteunt klanten bij beleidsplanning, meerjarenplannen en financi√´le analyses.¬†¬†
Je werkt in duo met een collegaconsultant om continu√Øteit te garanderen.¬†¬†
Je staat in voor kwaliteitscontrole, procesoptimalisatie en het oplossen van boekhoudkundige vraagstukken.¬†¬†
Je bouwt een vertrouwensrelatie op met de klant.¬†¬†
Je werkt met publieke softwarepakketten, kennis van Excel is noodzakelijk.¬†
Je bent actief binnen jouw provincie of nabije regio.¬†
Je werkt voornamelijk op locatie bij klanten, met afwisselende opdrachten doorheen het jaar.¬†
Je bent deel van een warm team van experten dat maandelijks samenkomt, en jaarlijks geniet van inspirerende teambuildings.¬†
Je wordt intensief begeleid door ervaren collega's en groeit op jouw tempo.¬†

geen klassieke kantoorfunctie
, maar een rol vol variatie, autonomie, klantcontact en impact.
